Bipolar, Add and depression one hell of a cocktail for any woman to have to deal with tie in the fact that he does not want to have children because of his condition and you have a man that is not as desirable as they all think he is. Well at least he thinks that, not that Nikki though that at all.Nikki the woman that he loves and subsequently loves him back with all of his faults and passionately.This book is funny, passionate and emotional throw in some danger and a mystery and you have one hell of a book.I love Nikki, a strong, smart and stubborn woman that will not sit by and let things just slide down her back no she fought hard for what she wanted, speaking her mind. The relationship that she  has with her brother Nico is amazingly funny and beautiful at the same time. The banter between them is envious as well as the love that is clear in his protectiveness.What shine through in this book is how smart and amazing Michael is and how much pain he is in due to his condition. But the lengths he goes to to have and keep Nikki are the most romantic and heart felt I have read in a long time. Beautiful! I want more!!!Lani Vales writing leaves you wanting more, her characters are believable and well written, people you could see your self hang out with. As  you read this book close you eyes and imagine the scenes playing out the pain in his heart, the love he has for Nikki, the hero he is to the children he saves... The movie you can see is the one that Lani has painted in your mind with her words. If you can do that then you know you are reading an amazing book!

Romance and a marina filled with Hot and sexy men, yeah this is your book! Cam co-owns the Marina with his three best friends Roan, Dare and Teague. Three men that are looking for more and not finding until Gannon comes in with his assistant Milly to rent out a pontoon for a work unity builder.Gannon and Cam are perfection, the mix of shy and boldness they both possess. The tenderness yet hungry way they approach their relationship. The way they both try to see each others faults to overcome and move forward with their hearts....Perfection!!!This group of men that share a bond strong of friendship and brotherhood. I love the dynamic they have have they share more than friendship, they have a brother hood.But it isn't just their bond that makes this book so amazing, it is Cam and Gannon. Reaching out to make a change in their lives by sharing and their past heart breaks and fears was emotional. This book reached in to my heart and just made it pump faster and harder.Nicole Edwards is the queen of making intense relationships more than just about the flash, they are filled with pain, fear and passion. More than anything you can always feel the love that flows through them. That is what you get when you read about Cam and Gannon love!

Filled with passion, suspense and danger even when you fall asleep this book is amazing. Aurelia's gift is not what she would consider a gift, seeing the future and not being able to do anything to help the out come is not what you would imagine this gift to be. It haunts he sleep making it impossible to close her eyes.She hides from the on that has hunted her for years, but she has her protector Rhys. Although she hates him for doing the unthinkable, her bond to him in permanent. Rhys will do anything to protect his love.As paranormal reads this one is fantastic. Not always so serious you find whit in Aurelia in her inner musings.Rhys and Aurelia are powerful and emotional and passionate. I love every minute.Annie has given us a world that you will want to visit over anf over again and after reading this you will be begging her to give you book two immediately!! *hint *hint ;)

Looking for a romance that is funny, filled with drama, endearing and breath takingly beautiful to read? Then this is the romance for you. A prequel to the Crashing Down series this book gives us the mindset of everyone before the wedding and on how Cali was helping her best friend cope with the impending deployment of her fiance and Cali's friend.Cali forever dating the wrong men finally finds the one in the most unsuspecting ways. I mean just when you think she is going i one direction bam we get a twist that explains how she met her forever.An amazing read that will melt your heart and fill at the same time Kristen give it all to you and more!

Loving one woman has defined him his entire life. Mikey has loved his red since he first met her. But he never stood a chance one she fell for his best friend. Now he hides from the pain of having lost both of his best friends to each other. Marrying and having a kid should have cured him of that pain, but betrayal can sour that and bring to the fore front the one woman that has always been there for him, Lia, the love of his life.Molly has seen the love that Mikey has for his friend and how he struggled to overcome the pain. Now back on tour with the band as her bodyguard can she helo him by being the friend he needs?OMG there is much to say about this book and the characters that live in it but not enough time. Yo will love most of them and then you will want to kick some of their butts(Julie) but I am not naming names(Roxy) I mean that would be a teaser and I don't like giving those out. ;PAny who, Mike and Molly yeah I know, they are magnificent friends and even better at loving each other.What can you find in this book? Love, Friendship, Drama, Suspense, Cat Fights,  Danger, and some hot dominating sexiness. Intrigued? I loved it all!!!! Those Bama Boy's will steal your heart, and I can't wait till the next one!!!

Buck has a rep. Yeah, puck bunnies are always around him trying to get more than just his attention. But he has found the one woman that can hold it for more than just a romp. Sunshine is his light and the reason he needs to change his image. Poor Buck, in trying to he keeps getting into more trouble!!!Sunny has lived with her brother Alex, the captain of Bucks Hockey team and all the negative media that follows it. She knows how most of it is lies and speculation, but with Buck some of it was true. Can she learn to believe in him and trust in his word?this is one funny, side pinching read that will have you reaching for the depends so that you don't embarrass your self as you read the trouble Buck get himself into.The Canadianism are out in full force in this book along with Buck's sister and her Yeti comment and lack of filter.  I kid you not that you will pee your selves reading this hysterical romance that will melt your heart and think of Buck as more than a yeti. You will love Miller for the man he is flaws and all!

Giving up control so that you can save the one you love? Seems like something a bit hard to swallow right? How about falling for your captor? Even harder. But things are far from what they seem. An you may be surprised when it all falls into place.Brighton has fallen into a world she never knew she would crave must less embrace after their sketchy beginning.Ryland the man of her dreams, literally he haunts her dream searing a kiss into her psyche that will not let her go. But her rough introduction into a world of darkness has also shown her a world of passion she didn't know existed.Trying to protect her brother and free him from his own hell, she doesn't realize she is a piece in a game that was laid out with out her knowledge.Ryland has a plan, one that yes included the beautiful Brighton, but did not include his heart.Secrets begin to unravel and hearts are broken but what you will get from this powerful read is that love can and should heal the wounds they inflict on each other.A dark romance that is simply perfection and beauty in it's darkness. I love it and all the complexities that will hold you breathless through out the book.

So don't be fooled this is a book about the days of the week, but about how some days can be better than others, if you have the right person to share them with.Haven independent and funny, she has been on the end of a heart break she never saw coming. But her best friend is always there to make sure she comes out unscathed.Spencer, loving, funny and protector, that is how she see him for the most part. Her heart would no survive if she ever lost him. He feels the same. Can friendship grow into more? Are they kidding them selves into thinking they don't share a bond that is more that what they already have?At first Glance you would think so, but this book needs more than just a glance, cuz it will steal your heart!

Binds that are held together by love and respect are really hard to break. Our friends have had to endure a lot and overcoming the newest attack to their bond might be the one that finally break no only their friendships but they might strain the relationships within the group.Kaleb and Josie have are dealing with issues stemming from her resent stress, adding a jealous ex into the mix to make things worse for them.Alexa is having commitment issues with her Garrett that are tested when she loses him to the darkness that can consume him.Lorali and Ian are struggling with her insecurities over his wealth and how she is perceived in the public. Worse of all is when Kaleb has to follow through with his job and possibly hurt not only is Joise but the friendships he has cultivated and held deep in his heart as more than just friends... Family.Incredibly the complexities of their relationships are not even that complex, they share a bond stronger than family although they are tied to each other as family. Confusing right? But if I begin to explain it we will have way to much time spent on how they are all connected when in fact all yo have to is read the first books in this amazing series. But don't fret, this book explains most of it and will be satisfying as hell to consume. Yes, I used the word consume because that is what will happen after the first time you read it making you want to read it again so that you can be completely satisfied that you didn't miss a beat of each of their relationships. Josie, Kaleb, Alexa, Garrett, Lorali and Ian a group that are stronger together than apart. A brilliant read that will fill you heart and make you crave more of them individually which will lead you to read the first books in the series... Don't say I didn't warn you!!!

If you’re looking for a quirky, yet relatable, romance novel, this is it. Doing It for Love is about 22-year old Lizzie and her boyfriend (soon-to-be husband) Landon. When Landon proposed to Lizzie, she proposed him a bet, a “no-sex-until-marriage” bet. Lizzie figured that their relationship was in a rut, they were the peas and carrots of relationships rather than strawberries and whipped cream, and she wanted more. So, in order to remedy this, she placed a bet with Landon, in order for them to have the best sex on their first night as husband and wife, they have to hold off on having sex until then, and whoever wins gets to go to their dream honeymoon spot - Sundance for Landon, and the Bahamas for Lizzie, and have the best sex of their lives.The novel itself was extremely funny at points, and I felt like my relationship related to theirs in a way, which I think many women can relate. Cassie Mae hit all the points needed to portray their relationship as happy, yet stuck. The two still loved each other very, very deeply, there was just a lack of spark in certain components in their relationship. I really enjoyed reading this novel, the jokes were funny, the relationship between Lizzie and Landon were adorable, and their friends were pretty great too. However, I would point out that there are a few plot holes, one in particular that was never answered - or at least if it was, I definitely missed it. Although I don’t want to give much away, there was a point where I could have SWORN Landon was cheating on Lizzie with her best friend, Theresa, while Lizzie was hiding in the closet. But context clues makes me believe otherwise. Either way, that night was never addressed. That mystery man that was tucking in a drunken Theresa and sleeping on her couch was never addressed. Although I do have an assumption of who it was, it seemed like such an intense and awkward encounter for Lizzie and a bit odd that Lizzie wouldn’t have even mentioned it. I want to reason that Lizzie was so obsessed with her wedding planning that that moment didn’t even cross her mind after that night… but it just makes me wonder, why was this scene added if it didn’t seem to have any reasoning for it? This part just threw me off a bit. But if you put that scene aside, I’m sure you won’t find too many other plot holes and enjoy the rest of the novel.~Steph

If you loved One to Hold you will totally love this rendition but with a paranormal twist.I loved reading the Ultra Alpha as Vampire Hunter. Tia did such a great job with her words I could close my eyes and picture his swagger and so much more. The passion that he and Melissa share is more intense with the paranormal twist. The heightened danger of the unknown coming to grab you was so nail biting that I had to put the book down just to take a breather.Patrick and Stuart were so much more swoon worthy with there shape shifting abilities and passion for the women they love and fall for. What I loved the most was that not only were the bonds to there loves stronger but the brotherhood they have, that bond felt stronger than in the original.If you haven't read One to Hold you will not miss a beat reading this book. It is a stand alone and completely holds your attention and breath as you read them maneuver the dangers of the underworld.Passionate, mysterious, and beautiful Derek will steal you hearts all over again!

Where to start, well I Cantrell you that this is the kind of closure you beg for in a romance  and I think that this one in particular needed to give us all saint lovers the closure of a beautiful HEA.Katy doesn't skimp she paints a picture of a happy and passion filled future for Malcolm and Rachael that will have you swooning and tearing up.From planning a life to beginning it this book was perfection and I think a thank you is what you will be saying g when you are finished reading the story of The Manwhore and his Bride.

Finally giving into the commitment bu that seems to be plaguing the 69 Bottles tour Dex is diving into it with Raine no bungee cord to hold him up, he is ready to fall and fall hard. See he has already done that she has become his addiction, but can he protect her from his tainted past of fast women chasing after him and throwing it in her face that he has such a HUGE following?If you have been following along in the tour of love as it has been dubbed then you know that Raine has a past to. An ex that just won't quit bugging her and is becoming a bit violent. Can they overcome the obstacles and guilt that can overcome most?Along with all of those obstacles they are discovering each other in ways they never thought they would share much less find compatible in any other person they have ever been with.Lots of questions, right? But reading this book will not only enlighten you to who Dex and Raine are but what they mean to each other a couple that overcome the hardest and most difficult trials to be together.Their relationship gets stronger the more the obstacles they face. Shocking the band with a secret they vowed to share together but escapes in the most stressful of ways.Excitement, mystery, passion, and a love that will make you cry. Your gonna love Dex Devouring Raine!

I love this little device that keeps me entertained and connected at all times. I a lover of books, I mean to the point that, yeah I would sniff the hard covers in the bookstore. No I never thought I would or rather be addicted to a cold piece of technology instead of a paper back in my hand. Boy was I blown away. I have the worlds biggest library at the tip of my fingers!!!I can read at night with out having to have an annoying reading light. Movies for when I fly, my favorite albums for when I am in the bath, and games for the kids when I am driving. I love it. It keeps me connected and as a book blogger this device is my life line. I started out with the first generation but upgraded to this one because it has more memory and storage for my quickly growing library.If your looking for something that you don't have to download a kindle app to (ipad users) this is the device for you!!!

Living with the sins of you past can no only be hard but it can be debilitating. Specially when you add guilt, shame and remorse. For Kace it was all of those roles into one shell of a life that he had condemned himself to. Vowing that he would atone for his sins by not living a full life, but watching out and protecting the ones that were left behind. Nothing could break that hard shell that he had created for his life, nothing but the woman with the green eyes, Layla.Layla also had a past that she lived with a past that shaped her future, the difference between her and Kace was that she promised to rise above her past and live her life to the fullest on her own terms. Now if only she could get Kace to see the best of himself, see what others see.I loved this story, so much and I will tell you ladies I was reading while working out in the gym. Why do I disclose this well because I tried so hard not to let the tears role down my cheeks as my chin trembled while I was on the treadmill. Kace, a beautiful man that couldn't see his own worth broke my heart. Then in the next breath he would heat me up with his words towards Layla.I loved Layla's character a strong woman that knew what she wanted and vowed to never let go. This story is powerful, so much more than just a romance story. A story of how ones will can be crushed and built back up by those that you cherish and cherish you. I love Kace and Layla!Oh and Jett swoon I love how threw it all he stood by his friend till the bitter and joyful end. Perfection!!!!

A Hot and sexy set of stories that will get your imagination going and the pleasure pumping through your soul.When a bad storm brings the Hottie, Tim, from the movie set filming in her small town, Tessa finds that chemistry unbearable to ignore.Tim introduces her to a side of herself that she never knew existed, something that he is guiding her through. But Tim hard core alpha make dom he is gentle with her, showing her how far she can go and how pleasurable it can all be.Can they last past the fleeting moments they share. Will they be able to go further than the time they have left?This series is addicting funny and very passionate and Tim will make every time with him more and more addicting for you. A must have!!!

Fate. I have read a lot of books that talk about fate bringing you to the one that you are mean to be with and they are all romantic and beautifully painful. But this story of how fate not only brought two people together but molded their lives into one they couldn't stand to live and made each other their salvation, well... it is a lasting imprint on my psyche.Dante a product of greed and nothing else although the person that made him was deluded enough to think otherwise. He brutalized his childhood and created a weapon, scarred and filled with revenge.Ryleigh was also created by the same man but what he thought he destroyed survived and has come back albeit unknown to the three of them to haunt him.No two people were made perfectly for each other at the hands of the same evil, but they found their other half. The missing pieces of their souls ripped at a young age only to be thrown together in the most unimaginable way.This is why this story is so powerful, because they fell and fought it from the beginning although he fought harder than she did.But, together they make the most beautiful of mayhem and destruction that you can't help but to be sucked into Dante and his little wolf.A powerful story that is more than darkness, it is more than romance, it is more than revenge, simply put it is FATEA book worthy of any and all shelves.

How to begin to live your life after you have lost the one that you planned to share it with? There is no easy answer to this, right? everyone grieves differently. For Kendall, she dealt with it by moving faster than she was really ready for. Her philosophy was get back in the saddle and giddy up. But the pain is to fresh and no matter how hard she tried she just isn't ready for another part of her heart to be given away.Now we also have the SCHMEXY DR. Allaway, the one that she sets her sights on to help her overcome the pain of her loss. It was to be one and done. He on the other hand had other plans, but he had to break down her walls that are freshly erected and strong as hell.Giving her every chance he to see how they can be more but still holding back for fear that she will break him more than his past has, he gives her the sapce she wants.Okay ladies sorry but this book ends in a cliffer, and yes you will be pulling your hair out to get to the bottom of Ansons secret. You will scream to find out if they end up together you will beg your kindle to give you answers that simply aren't there. What you will get is the chance to read it again when book 2 comes out.Umm Elle that will be soon right????

Need something to take with you when you travel? Got multiple things to plug in? This portable USB Charger is just that. Portable light weight and small enough to put into your hand bag. All you need is an outlet and your set to go. You can plug in 6 devices and be able to do all of your media surfing with out worrying if your battery will die down. I know that is my worry as I load up my pic to my instagram and my battery starts to flame out. But now as I sit in my hotel room I have my kindle charging next to me, my daughter phone and iPad are sleeping and charging getting ready for the long ride home.Convenient that is how I would describe this charger and if you are like me and need to ensure your devices are charged you will to. A great investment for those who travel!

Living a life where you rule your world and are successful a it, why change it?Dean Harper was good at what he did and he did it with out attachments. So why change what was working for him. No one could capture his attention for very long, until he met the one woman that challenged him and annoyed the crap out of him more than anything else...Lily.Lily, bright beautiful and always not scene for what she was. Ye her beauty tend to make people see just the outer shell which she loves but is simply more than the cover of her own book. Okay you get what I am saying she is more than just a pretty face.So trying t be taken seriously is hard in the restaurant business specially if you wan tot be taken serious by the one person that is making you dizzy, Dean.This book is filled with the battle of wills that will probably rival you own at home. Their witty and colorful banter is hysterical. Lily is a woman that will capture your heart. Some one that you will wish to emulate.Dean, yes let us not forget Dean and his beautiful smoldering eyes and dirty mouth. Oh and if you close your eyes you will be able to picture everything that comes out of his mouth ans whispered into her ear. It will give you goosebumps. Passionate and refreshing this book and their battle of wills is just the right thing to get you through a day when all you want to do is yell at the world to give you a break. Dean Harper awaits you with a glass of wine to help you through that though day. Get ready to devour him ladies!

A Story that will connect with you emotionally if not mentally. Marlene is a woman that has had enough. Enough of being with someone that treats horribly and hurts her physically. She runs and tries to start a new life, where she finds Elias.Handsome and mysterious Elias vows that he will protect her and love her. Secrets eat at her and put doubt in her heart as her past comes back to try and claim her. Travis adds fuel to the fire by accusing Elias as the one that is putting her in danger.Intrigues yet? Yeah the best part of this story is that you become vested in the fate of these characters. I mean Marlene has to choose and you hope she chooses right. Leaving you wanting for more. More of Elias and more of Marlene. Love, pain and emotional abuse can be overcome if you find the right path to your fate.

Looking for a read that will keep going and going and going? This is the summer or rather anytime read that holds more than just one happy ending. 11 Of you favorite authors ready for you to gobble up their romance and Happily ever afters.Sexy, Funny and Passionate alphas that will seep you off your feet. I can;t just pick one story to focus on because I loved all of them. They Live in my heart now and I will cherish them forever.Make sure that you have your favorite snacks and a day where you can relax and be taken away by the romance and passion in this amazing collection of novels!

A Fantasy novel from the master of passion Lucian Bane. No wonder I loved it right I mean it has everything you could want in a fantasy novel. First you have Poe, handsome, sexy, Protective, funny and personable. Then you have the Scribbler, Charlotte, a writer some one who has an imagination and has to put it down to paper. A funny quirky and lovable character that is the perfect match to Poe.So a fantasy novel gives us exciting adventures and mysteries to solve and this one does not fail in that quest. What Lucian gives us is simply put more of what we crave. Sexy and mysterious you will be hooked from the first page of this book wanting to know more about the threat that lurks behind the knock at the door.I can't wait to read book 2!

Thrilling, suspenseful and HOTT!! This series gets better and better the Coalson brothers are amazing. You can feel the love they share for each other and the women in their lives. While investigating the fire in his brothers construction company Lucky finds the one. The one woman that stunned him and brought out a protective side that although he has had for his family he never had for a woman.Yeah the Alpha in him is in high gear for Claudia and she never saw him coming.The danger level in this series goes up a notch so get ready for more suspense and more Hottness from the Coalson men. Lucky is gonna melt you kindle!

Fear, it holds you back from the most amazing things that can happen in your life. This is what this story is about. You have Alex and Tripp the best of friends for most of their lives. They love each other, they are best friends, they have each others back... ALWAYS. THEY LOVE EACH OTHER!!!! So what is the problem, well they are the problem. They let their fears of losing the most important person in their lives that they might end up losing that person they cherish the most.When Tripps boyfriend kind of challenges her and her bestie Alex to get together trying to prove a point, things get hotter than any of them thought possible. Bound to happen, everyone can see they are meant to be, so is this a story of fate? Nahhh this is simple they love and when they finally admit it to themselves the story becomes amazing. I love Alex and Tripp their quirkiness together is simply breath taking and refreshing. Not to mention the heat and smoldering looks they give each other, make sure you have a cold drink as you read the evolution from friends to Spectacular more!

Okay first if you haven't read the first books it is a must. Dominic is a complicated man and to understand him and Aleena you have to have read the first books.Now with that being said....WOW, just when I thought this series could not get any better I am blown away. Aleena is braver and stringer in this book than ever before. She stands up for herself against the nastiness of the women in Dominic's high society, namely Penelope.Dominic has grown in his relationship with both Aleena and his birth mother, making more than an Alpha dom in my eyes. His passion and openness with Aleena are what makes this book even more than the rest. His passion has grown more and so has their relationship. Stronger feelings and stronger bonds making this a romance that lasts longer in your heart.

Madysin has suffered much loss and overcome it with her faith and the love of her family and most importantly the love of her life Blaze.Blaze has had to fight for everything he holds dear to him, his family and his career. But never did he feel a will to protect and fight harder than for his wife Mady. The love they share and the trust they hold in each other will fill your heart with so much while you read this book, that you will gobble up each word faster than you thought would be possible. The emotions that pour out of them will have you in tears. I had to step away for a bit and finish it at a slower pace. The tears running down my face as I neared the end of the book where my heart was in my throat, I couldn't believe that it was over.Blaze is the man that you hope and dream to have in your life. Faithful and loves you steadfast with everything he has. Mady is brave and strong and everything a woman that is confident should be. Partners is the best way to describe them together one soul. When one of them hurt they both hurt. They share a bond that is more than love. They are a united soul that will affect you as you read along.

Xavier is not nice man. He doesn't pretend to be, but what he is, is something she needs.Alyssa has to protect her daughter and keep a roof over her head. She will do anything. That is how she meets Xavier. He has had to live a hard life and learned at a young age that he can't wear his heart on his sleeve. He is a dangerous man and everyone knows it. When she walks into his club something in him snaps. He has to have her be his and only his. So, begins the dangerous courtship that will have you scratching you head and wondering what in the heck he is thinking with he warped rules.But, this is a romance book and you will see just how much he is willing to do to protect his Aurora and her daughter from the hell he lives in. The person he is with Aurora will warm you heart and break it all at once.Passion and danger fill this book and also yes ladies a cliffer. I am begging Jessica please I need more of Xavier and Aurora.... AHHHHH!

Leading the life that he loves with out the restraints of his family's wealth, Cash is more than just a bartender he is part owner of some of the hottest bars around. A mixologist is what he like to be called and yes he is what the ladies come to the bars to hook up with. Yes, a bastard to most but to those he calls friend... No he will stand up for you no matter what. He is loyal!Savannah is off limits, to Cash but she fantasizes of what could be with the manwhore himself. The light flirting they have going on is harmless until it becomes more than just harmless.The moment Cash realizes that Savy is the one he will do anything to make sure she knows that he only sees her.OMG this book was funny, sexy and passionate. The banter between Cash and Savy is easy going and fun to imagine happening in you head as you read the scene being painted by Eve Jagger. Cash with his smooth talking and sexy swagger that can schmooze the pants of any woman.What I loved best about this book was that he really took the time to get to know her and and help her overcome some of the things that Savy so hung up on about herself. When they realize how perfect they could be together, well for Cash is was a religious event something that changes him, now nothing will come between him and his Savy.I loved it is reminiscent of the movie "Cocktails" but so much hotter!!!

Over coming the past is a hard thing, specially when you past is filled with both visible scars and inner scars. For Logan his scars are physically visible and yet he hides them well. He has to because there are other threats that he has to hide from, but he meets Elle, he decides it time to face those demons head on, show the world his demons and protect the woman he loves.Elle, has been hiding, hiding her heart and love from the world, her scars were inner scars. When she meets Logan her heart begins to beat and come to life for the first time in her life and she will do anything to keep it.Love that is doomed? Nope this couple sticks together they have found their other half and know that they would be fools if they didn't stick together and see it through. For Logan their is n choice he has to keep her and protect her, He has fallen and fallen faster than he ever thought possible.I love the passion and openness they have with each other. She has found the person that completes her and makes her feel safer than she has ever felt. A new feeling, she can sense him which is something she has never, ever felt, and she loves it.If your looking for a romance that has levels of complications that will keep you at the edge of you reading stoop, look no further, Logan and Elle are for you. If you are looking for a romance that is hot and smoldering, yet loving and passionate, Logan and Elle are for you. If you are looking for danger and action and a mystery that you will crave to unravel, Logan and Elle are for you. In short You have to add Blow to your e-reader or book shelves.Kim Karr's characters come to life in this story every single one of them are  characters that you can picture in your head as the movie you play in your imagination excites you more than you thought. Logan smoldering hero and man that will star in all of your dreams. I can't wait to read the second book in this series!!!

Honor, Loyalty, Respect and Love. A code to live by and when you give all of these things to your best friend the man that saved you life, you have to honor his wishes above your own heart. Above the things you want in life. Above the woman and man that you love. How much longer could Leyton hold out on sharing the love of the woman that has been in his heart since he was a teenager. Ashlynn is the reason his heart beats and Jase well he heats Leyton up with just a glance. But they are both forbidden and Leyton made a promise, a promise he would honor to his best friend Max, Ashlynn's brother.This book is sexy, smoldering and so much more. It is filled with love and honor and strength and love. Familial love and passionate love.This is what makes Nicole's books so enticing, it isn't just about the flash, no it's about the inner struggle. The fight to be who you are. The battle to overcome what you feel is right, giving into your heart, no matter the consequences. When Leyton does this, when he finally gives into Ashlynn and Jase, it is more than just a romance. It is explosive and emotional. You are routing for him to give in and give his heart to the woman that has owned for years.It is exciting and heart breaking to the point that you don't want the story to end, you will always want more of the characters in this book. Leyton, Ashlynn and Jase will capture you heart with their dirty talk and passionate moments, and most of all the way they love and protect each other. Yeah this book will make you top read for 2015!

Best friends, a favor he couldn't refuse a chance lost. This is the story of friends that would do anything for each other even cross that line that you should never take lightly. But when they do hearts are broken and a friendship that slides away. Flash forward to 5 years and a chance meeting to bring back all those feeling of a connection lost and a love that they can't deny. Second chances can they make it happen.The love these two share first as friends and then years later as the rekindle their friendship realizing that thy were lying to each other that their feelings are much deeper than they would dare to admit to themselves.\Get ready to break out the tissues cuz you gonna need it!

Kam, his career was taking off he was going to make it and make it big, but the one thing he thought he would have with him at his side?  He lost herLaney thought they would be the couple that would achieve the dream, high school sweet hearts and then off to college where they would survive temptation and remain together. The pressure and neglect become to much and Laney, called it quits.So if you have read the first book you know that you were craving book 2 more than your next breath. Yeah I was and Marissa gave me exactly what I wanted a book that starts right from where book one left off and then in to the the present and future you were imagining in the movie playing out in your head. Kam and Laney are what fate and the definition of fate are. Good things come to those that wait. Or is it, You have to let the thing you love free and see if it comes back to you. Yeah that's it!!! So grab a glass of wine and get ready for the flick chick that is your mind to play the romance of Kam and Laney. Oh and don't forget the chocolate and tissue!

You start up with the love that is shared by this amazing and loving and dedicated couple. The honeymoon to rival all honeymoons. Blake and Erica have made it to their dream and started with their forever. When they get home their forever gets threatened. Betrayal, yeah that is what you get in this book. Attacks are coming at them but the one that will hurt the most is the betrayal that is thrust on Blake. Okay enough teasers!This book will have you hooked obviously from the beginning, but it will keep you on the edge of you seat with surprise after surprise as you read on. The theme that will register the most is that Blake's love for Erica is what keeps him grounded to the man he has become. Erica, needs Blake now more than ever, their love is the center of her universe.Passion, and Love that is what they give you. A glimpse into what their connection and passion will have in store for their future. This is the book that has you wanting to finish and hating that you did. Blake and Erica, stole my heart.

Healing, putting your self back together when you have been broken down. It's a long hard road. After having some physical and emotional therapy which all great, right. Well then come the reality of what comes next right how do you move on? When Jamie's therapist introduces the person that sparks healing in his eyes, Cole.Now this is kind of an insta love romance but with work cut out for them. Because insta love isn't always just that right? You have to have a dash of drama and let me tell you Jamie has to deal with drama, I mean Cole is hot and smoldering and.... Yeah you get the picture.So when they get the heart and souls lined up you can bet that the sparks that fly are hot and passionate and perfection. Cole and Jamie have that kind of love that will make your heart fly and your tears flow. five stars from the fairy!

Can you fall in love, before you even know what love is? Can it span a life time? Can it elude you hurt you and break you? can it be even stronger than you ever thought possible? YES, YES and YES!! Oh and YES!Alex and Lucas were childhood friends that were more than friends with a bond that was stringer than any of her other pals. Did they know what that mean? Nope. As they grew up things began to change and hearts began to break. Did they still love each other? YUP!I love the way M. Robinson writes, she give you the history behind the romance. I mean there is no way for you not to know what Alex and Lucas are thinking and suffering for their love and hearts. It is refreshing and heart breaking at the same time. I will tell you, you will want to kill each of them at different points in this book, but for the most part you will absolutely love them. I do and Lucas although he wrenched my heart out several times, yeah he is still swoon worthy. Because in the end he only ever loved one woman and that was his Half pint.I can't wait for Jacob's story sparks are gonna fly! Bo (Lucas) is gonna beat his ---!!! Love it!!!

She found the reason to love, the person that gets her, the person she could see being with for the rest of her life. Her Captain America, Michael.He finally found his dream girl or rather he finally got her. They are a couple but could her keep her with our disclosing his past and the demons that he hinds from her?This is more than just a princess finding her prince story, no is far to steamy for that. It is so much more than that. It is a modern version where the damsel saves her prince! How's that for woman power! Margaux is stronger in this book she knows what she wants, well she was like that before, but not for something as important as her love, her heart, Michael. No this is something that she has to fight for with everything she has in her.See in this book Michael gives in to his fears, no I won't give anything away, but just know this... Your gonna want to kick his butt. Our Captain America is sinking and he need his princess more than he ever though he would.In short, Angel and Victoria have done it again! This is simply put more, more than a fairy tale it is the pure definition of HEA For the Princess and her Captain America. Ladies, I want more oh and I love the teaser that you gave me towards the end maybe a new book with Kill's besties involved? OMG I soooo hope so!

Pain some people run from it, some people suffer through it and others thrive on it. Alex was once a victim but she was set free from the chains of pain that held her to the succulent pain that brings her to life. Rafe, would controls her pain. Rafe holds her heart. Rafe brings her to life, together they live and strive for the pain to bring them euphoria.but what happens when your heart the person that make you feel alive leaves you? What happens when he suddenly comes back?  FREEDOM.This book, this series is filled with pain both pleasurable and degrading pain of being raped and held against your will. But through the pain a love shines that is all encompassing and bright, giving you the feeling Gemma is trying to convey with her words~ FREEDOM TO BE LOVED. You feel it it radiates from the pages. Once you finish reading it you will know what Alex and Rafe share and you heart will shine for them.

So I know that at some point in your lives you have ridden a roller coaster, right? Filled with sharp turns, thrilling dips, and breath taking earth shattering finales. Well that is what you get when you read this breath taking series. Harlow's characters grab you and make you their own, yeah not the other way around.Elle is the strong and strong willed. Beautiful and brave, that is what you have in Elle.Ryder is complex, you will learn about him in this installment than you have had in the first two. What you get from Ryder is heart breaking making you love him even more than you thought you did before. Together they are magnificent, and I am left in mourning that I finished a book that has given me heart and soul. a must have!

Wow, can I say amazing!  I'm totally in love with this story.  It's wonderful to see a character like Kinsey in romantic novels.  She's a fire cracker!  Strong, sexy, and very much opinionated.  Yet, a moment of weakness lead her to Chicago where Mr. July; Luke Almeida ignites a fire that she thought was long gone.Luke is one of Chicago's elite firefighters whose arrogance and ill temper has lead him and his firehouse Engine 6 under public scrutiny.  Kinsey is Chicago's best PR personal who is sent to lead the " Clean Up Luke Almeida's Image".  Of course this turns out to be a big challenge for both Kinsey and Luke who are both stubborn.Luke is quickly attracted to Kinsey's spark.  Both had been in previous relationships where they felt restraint both in their physical and emotional aspects of the relationship.  Kinsey's a woman who is experienced and knows what she wants and is not afraid to say it.  It's liberating to see a character like Kinsey who is comfortable with her sexuality.  Luke is so drawn to her that he let's his defenses down and allows Kinsey to Dominate him.  Yet, since they both have strong personality both want dominance over each other.  Their relationship turns into a full on web of desire and passion.I give this book 4 stars. It portrays strong, powerful, sexy women like Kinsey and others like her that you meet in this amazing story.  What I loved about this story was that you got to meet other characters like the Dempsey's who are so complex and have a story of their own to tell.~Scar

First the good news, it is quite readable on a Sunny day outside on the beach. There is only the slightest glare when direct sun is on it, but it is still very readable, if you do have bubbles in the finish product this will have an annoying glare. The screen protector is of good qualityAnd than the "not as good", the length of the screen protector is about 1/32nd of inch too long.  Since it is made to almost exact measurements you must really install it perfectly.  I think Boxwave should get all their employees to install this screen protector and see if they can accomplish this task.  I doubt they could.I did manage to install it well, however 1/32nd of an inch is on the inside of the black bezel, which looks fine but is a lot of work to install.If would be perfect if it was bit shorter in length,
It is made of genuine good quality leather, great stitching and protective. I wish it was a magnetic "go to sleep and wake-up case" but for the price it is a great buy.

We run a goat farm so it is important to stay connected.  Letting are goats roam in the Sierra Nevada Hills we use these often. These Radios are extremely clear and easy to operate. There is a voice that tells you what channel your on, it the battery's are low etc. The company Retevis is the best, very nice to deal with, they obviously want to be number one in the Radio business.

I am a Posture Alignment Specialist and this book is filled with excellent facts of the bodies needs. I  enjoyed her views on every day movement and exercises.  She is a bit chatty however the book is great at getting you to understands how the body works.  If you're looking for this to be a therapeutic book on how to get yourself out of chronic pain unfortunately it doesn't have custom menus that you will need.  Pete Egoscue's classic book on Pain Free is better for the actual exercise menus. I do appreciate her knowledge and enthusiasm. It is a good read.

This fit my Maytag portable Dishwasher even though the part number was not listed.  Very easy to replace.  Unscrew a 11  screws from the inside cover, lift out and pull the connectors off the assembly. It does take a flat tip screwdriver to gently wiggle the two connectors off. Make sure you mark where the colored wires go.  I almost order the latch without the handle.  Since the handle was broken this is the assembly that included the handle.  This assembly seems quite common to a few dishwasher

The safe is definitely worth the money. It is heavy duty and does provide a safe place for documents.  The slot is perfect for my needs.There are three complaints that I see in the write-ups... perhaps I can help.The key only needs to be turned counter clockwise just a little bit, perhaps a 16th of a turn, to unlock the safe.  If you try to turn it with force it will break.The key cover just pops off with just a little bit of force and it easily presses back on.If you have trouble setting the code perhaps a number was pressed prior to setting the code.  Just take out the batteries which resets the code and try again. If you do not the code will not be able to be set.The other comments were that the safe can be opened without keys or combination code.  I don't know if this is true but most leading brand safes for under $200 dollars can be opened easily. You can find out how by searching on Google.  This Safe is a deterrent, thieves will not have a problem. Very secure safes sell for hundreds.  It is highly suggested not to lock a gun in a inexpensive safe.One last thought, buy lithium batteries  do not discharge when not in use and will last a long time.

Well made with excellent artwork. The tiny envelopes have cool stuff in adorn every page, Little things to touch. Maps and History.This does not create anything new but the pictures, art and letters add immensely to visualizing of the story.  I have shared this book with others and have always got very favorable comments...Like wow!

The only instructions for this kit is a short paragraph on how to remove your stereo for your model car. Since these instructions includes many cars it fills all but one of the pages on just removal and just one page on installation.  You will need to remove many tabs and the only indication of which tabs to remove is one single blurry small front picture, with no instructions.  You will need to remove over 6 tabs, and only if you have a dremel tool, with a cutting tool,  will that be easy. This is the absolute worse kit I have ever seen and the instructions are totally worthless.  Good look if you decide to purchase this item.

I was looking for a medium size messenger bag that could be used daily and would hold a Microsoft Surface RT about the size of an IPad. They go from a size that is too small to one that is just a bit too big.  The right size is always the question of being every day functional.I stumble onto this bag, and although it is a not as small as I would like it is without doubt a beautifully crafted messenger bag. Fleece lined and padded where the computer will be and it has several useful pockets, like a water bottle pocket, pens, wallet, camera and phone etc. It has a shoulder pad that really works. The quality of this bag needs to be seen and inspected to to be fully appreciated .  This is a keeper even though it is a "bit big", the quality and usefulness of this wonderful. The price is super low for this bag. It should sell easily for twice the price I paid.

Lee was against Slavery and the break up of the union, he just couldn't wage war against Virgina.  He was loved by everyone around him and later was a President of a college.  His leadership skills are certainly ones to be studied.

I have been using this to recharge my Surface RT.  It charges quickly.  All the extension cables that plug in between Intocircuit and the tablet sold on Amazon work.  I have bought all of them since the are relatively inexpensive.  I was looking for the strongest magnet to attach to the Microsoft Surface RT inlet plug.  There was only one cable that didn't plug in securely.  I have mainly used this external battery for partial charges since it shuts off after a full charge.It is made in China but I am sure most things today are, however it certainly looks high quality.

Although I must give it 5 stars because of the price and quality, it is very small and barely fits a Surface RT in a case.  If you are just putting the RT and the keyboard in the case it will just fit and you have a smaller pocket for a few small items.
Works great with the original Surface RT, back lighting is adjustable with keys on the keyboard.  As good a or better than first type cover.
They are quality bits with a good assortment of types.  My only wish is for a better case.  The bits fall out the case real easily.  But since it the tool that really matters I gave it 5 stars

Update:If you program this printer as a wireless and latter want to use the USB connection you will not be able to do it.  Since it is a small and compatible printer I want to share it with my Surface Tablet and upstairs computer but also be able to use it at my office.  I had to reprogram it after installing it as a wireless to work with a USB connection. It seems it can be a wireless or a used with a USB connection.The DVD that comes with the printer works well and is easy to understand. You can set the settings through the USB connection.Original feedback,The printer works great, a absolutely wonderful deal if you can get it installed.  I have it working wonderfully with the Microsoft Surface RT.However you might want to take the instructions provided with the printer and burn them.  They do however have a great PDF manual on line from HP.I went to the control panel and through the add printer got the printer to finally install.  The device settings were HP setting plus  the driver name; HP LaserJet Mono PCLmS Class Driver.Several Amazon user feedbacks gave instructions how they installed the printer but there results didn't match what was actually happening on my Surface RT.You can tell it is installed correctly by running a test page.

There 3 ways I like to use a table:The first is in my hands and the case I have been using have a flap that makes it very bulky. This flap comes off on this case snaps easily off and it also has a hand strap that makes it easier to hold.The second way is in a tablet holder.  I have a perfect one but the other cases because of the flap is too thick to put in the holder.  Without the flap, the the tablet fits perfectly.And last of all if I need to have a stand that is very adjustable the flap snaps back on to become a very adjustable stand.  I couldn't be happier.The workmanship of Moko cases are strong and made well, with the flap snapped on, the Tablet is well protected from falls.

The placemats arrived in great shape.  I looked around and it was the only thing that would work on my entry table.  The elephant design is very nice and the weaving and sewing of the reed is great.  You get a lot for your money along with Thailand artistry.
Well made and nice lens, the power seems to be accurate.  The circular lens are smaller than I wanted them, but everyone says they still look good on me.

Update:Installed another screen protector on 2nd Surface RT quickly with no flaws. It is quite easy if you follow the below steps.  View the screen in different light before applying the protector you may see dust that you thought was not there.  I do believe getting the screen slightly moist is a key to easy installation.  The touch feature of the screen does not loose any sensitivity. If you are worried about water intrusion keep the Screen off for 24 hours to ensure it is dry. I have never damaged a tablet.First Review:It is important to have tablet screens gets protection. All of my screens get covered. Look at those that are selling tablets on ebay without screen protectors, most have scratched screens. A larger size screen is harder to cover, however with extreme patience and calmness I  always manage.  The instructions say "micro" bubbles will disappear which means very only tiny bubbles. Also if you get water inside the tablet they will not replace your tablet. Tips.Don't rush, set aside at least 20 minutes to complete this task. It may take just a few minutes to install, but rushing is a sure way to failClean the screen perfectly and than install quickly, dust seems to be everywhere and just the smallest bit will cause failure.Wash your hands before applying, avoid fingerprintsExplore how it will fit before applying. There are always sensors that need to be positioned around. So protectors need to be position perfectly. This screen protector has a small amount of give. If it doesn't work at first you can always peel them up and reposition them while wet. Never give up.A very small bubble will disappear if there is no dust underneath it.  Keep working the squeegee.If all else fails screen protectors can be removed rather easilyIf your a perfectionist, you might not want to install a shield. But sooner or later the screen will scratch.I like to moisten the screen just a bit, this makes it much easier to slide the protector around.This Shield was installed perfectly with no bubbles.

I assemble this without instructions. I slid the inside slats together first and than but the side peaces on, six supplied screws hold it together.  It is very nice looking. I installed on my porch to hid a AC Unit. Four  brackets hold it securely.  There are two heavy metal pieces that will go into the ground for garden use. A very good buy
It works well and I do like the buttons; it saves from disconnecting usb cables
Cheap but looks real from afar. Have it mounted on a post so it moves with the wind and even though I didn't buy it to scare away creatures, I definitely have seen less squirrels
It is very functional and strong. Fit in the corner of my shower and is able to hold 2 large bottles.It is not beautiful but for the price I did not expect it to be.
Although I have a 8.1 windows phone this book was very thorough on clearly explaining everything.  It is quite the deal. I hope Paul writes one on Windows 10

Bought a used one for 4 dollars, it was quite loud. By the wear of the foam you can tell that it had a lot of pressure applied to the pad especially on the forward part of the pad. After Dis-assembly I found the platen to be broken and one of the forward vibrating post that move the platen was broken.  The motor sounded strong and everything else was surprisingly in great shape especially after someone gave it quite the beating during use.I agree with one feedback. There is only supposed to be a slight  downward pressure put on the pad just to hold it in place as you move it around  letting the vibrations do all the work.I decided since it was such a great deal at $49 with carrying bag I would buy one and use the old one for parts.It would have just cost a little over 24.95 to easily fix the old one.
Easily to pair with any device, sound is clear it is really a very nice deal.

Very sturdy well built table. We are using it in our entryway. It looks and feels and is real furniture.  Easy to assemble.  Just 8 bolts that screw into the existing installed nuts.  Everything that is required to put it together is there.  It was packaged nicely and detected to scratches.  Also it did not smell as shipped furniture often does.  A very nice deal.
Sturdy fan. We have been using the fan on low speed. It is quiet with enough  air flow to cool our home. Metal grill and stand, well made,easy to assemble.

The instructions on the package was perfect.  You do need to take the screen off the door and lay the door flat.  I used a rubber mallet to get the pieces to press together.  A rubber mallet and razor blade is required in the instructors.  You do need to cut the screen before it will press together. When completely pressed together the door is quite stable, I did not see a need to put it together with nuts and bolts as some did. My cat learned the door quickly. It works well. TOne of my favorite coffees, I like a dark brown roast.,Kicking Horse consistently gives a good roast, using good beans.  I use this for espressos, it does cary a kick. I hope coffee prices will start going down. It is ridiculously high.

This is not an easy program, and the books available are not easy to understand.  I can't believe there are not a lot of software programs available to help with small business finances. In my opinion putting this screen on is difficult. It is almost the exact size of the screen so even if you get it just a little bit crooked it will overlap the sides, meaning it will not go on correctly.  And keeping All dust off your screen is difficult.However I did manage to get it on without bubbles.  I think what I learned is it will come off again and again, so lifting it up a bit as shown in the video is a must if you wish to get it perfect. I must have lifted several times to get it perfect.  Do go slowly and do use the tape supplied.The fit was perfect only when it was aligned  perfectly. The maps do need updating as the Points of Interest and a few of the streets are out of date however there is a usb update program that I haven't used yet but did download. I am glad I got it. This is a absolute great fitting case that is fits the Nokia 635 perfectly.  I like that the screen is protected. It looks simple but elegant.  I really wanted leather but I think this case may be more functional.

it perfectly fit and stays on well on my Dell Windows 8.1 touch screen Computer, It doesn't get in my way of typing but does provide good protection.

It is well made except for the plastic rotating square gear. The body is heavy and made of metal. It is rechargeable and you can plug it in a wall socket with a very short cord supplied. It is quieter and lighter and does a great job.It doesn't have the exchangeable heads but that certainly not a selling point on the Kemel.When every one rates it a 5 star you know that this post is not going to be popular but I think it is important that Amazon customers hear from all sides. Works well for dentures and partials. Just add your tablets let them dissolve and run just once. You will have them very clean. I do let them soak overnight.  It is a nice stainless steel holder so their is no problems.

Very nice computer, a steal for this price.  Need to let it get all its updates before you judge the speed; it does get faster.  It is certainly not a gaming computer but I use it for my business and it works great. I did add more memory, its very easy to do, especially needed if your in and out of several programs at once.  The touch screen is delightful to use.  I have always used Dell, they have a very good in house repair warranty.I used the warranty on my last Computer and it saved me lots of Money. Our household loses scissors so we bought two of these because of the low price. Nice sharp scissors for the price you simply can't do better.They are sharp and should cut most reasonable type items. They are held together with a screw so they are better than some.

It is light quiet and performs its job flawlessly.  Although it is made of plastic, it is obviously of good quality. No pinching, just a quick removal of hair.  I used one rechargeable AA battery and the motor spins freely and easily. A must have...

June 1st.You do not need to unlock your phone or use it with AT&T.  Slip in an H20 Sim card, easy to do, and you can have great phone service at half the cost.  This phone is excellent, I can't see needing anything else.  Sound is excellent. And the graphics appear sharp.  When Window Phone Apps get a bit better, I do think you will see more and more people going with windows phones.  I do predict the price of this phone will go up. This is my 3 phone. Bought one just as a backup, for the price this is the best phone out their.  It makes a great tablet even if you do not wish to use the phone.  Runs off of wireless easily.May 9thI  purchased a 32 GB SD card and a  unlocked code for 8 dollars.  This phone is great. It is now loaded  with lots of music and maps etc. I installed a Google Account and Facebook Account so I have all of my old contacts. The screen is great for every day apps. Plugged my USB cable into my Computer and the  transfer of Documents, Music and Pictures was easy.For insurance in case this one breaks I bought another one.  All I need to do if the phone breaks is to swap out the SD Card and Sims Card and it will be ready to go. The paid for apps can be reinstalled. The Windows apps are without a doubt inferior to Google and Apple.  However there are some great apps that will certainly do the job and are daily becoming better.  Of course this is Microsoft's number one mission.  The GPS has a great receiver.  Copilot and Bing Maps are very good Apps.  The Speakers deliver enough sound to be heard well.  It works with Pay Pal here. There is really nothing lacking. When windows gets popular, and it will, you will not get a good deal like this again.My first Review on Getting the PhoneI like the phone. Screen looks good, its fairly fast.  Of course windows does take a little bit of time to learn.  I do not have cellular service where I live but I needed it to swipe credit cards.  Unfortunately I kept getting errors so I couldn't even download the program from the Store.  I solved the error.  It was the date and time being not correct.  The setting was on auto date. Since this is corrected through taking it off auto and setting the date and time. Everything now works, and it can now swipe cards through paypal here

What does a  company mean when it says it will fit most Coleman lanterns!  Normally they list model numbers.  On the double mantle propane lantern it definitely does not fit with or without the bracket.  As many have said if you drill a hole they have gotten it to fit in their lantern.  I did try for about 45 minutes to see if there was a way I could fit it but unless I was willing to try to enlarge the match hole, "which I wasn't"  it would not fit. Unless it fits perfectly you will have a difficult time twisting the bottom control that lights the mantle.So I think Coleman should start listing model numbers or at least say it may fit you lantern

My cat loves this inexpensive cat scratching post, saves my house furniture.  Been using this for almost 2 years. After the cat has scratched through the rope, I decided to buy another. I prop the base by a wall and it will not tip with my 13 pound cat really scratching.  The toy doesn't last a long time but the post did.

Easy to use and operate, works at a good distance form receiver.  My only complaint is it doesn't have a very rich sound. However it is clear and loud enough to work well. I am happy to have them.

I was able to get 5 of these bags that were  used from David's Tools. However these bags turned out to be brand new.  I wanted to get my routers, and sanders undercover since my sheds are not moisture proof.  These bags are very well made and will last me a lifetime.

Heavy duty, unbreakable, painted extremely well for the elements. When the box arrives at your home, it may require two people it is heavy and awkward.  The poles go together easily without tools. I had used a Sonicare toothbrush for years until it broke. Because of the high price I changed to Oral B.You really can't compare the two since they brush the teeth differently. However I missed the Sonicare because the Oral B just doesn't seem to get my teeth or gum line as clean. Plus my dental checkups were not as good.I finally decided to go back to using Sonicare and as always I did need to make a choice from all the newer models.  The HX6211 is the basic model for all the toothbrushes the rest have features that I really don't need. I disengaged the soft start my holding the power button for a few seconds while in the charger and until I heard the one beep.The tooth brush has as much power as the older models perhaps a bit more.  The one basic principle of this toothbrush is light pressure. The toothbrushes will last a lot longer and the brushing is more effective.My teeth feel clean again along with my gums.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this toothbrush.

Overall I'm very happy with these XL gloves.  I use them to clean around the house and while cleaning out our critters cages.  Other brands used to tear pretty easy without much abuse.  Especially cleaning out the critter cage where dried, prickly hay would reek havoc on cheaper gloves I've used.  These have held up very nice.These are the perfect fit for my hands, but unfortunately very loose around my wrist so I keep trying pull/tug to make tighter.  That is the only reason I reduced the review by 1 star.I do not have a latex/powder affliction, so that was not a deciding factor in choosing this from Vine.

I must start out by saying I had their Am3s fitness/sleep tracking device and it performed so poorly, I was hoping that something else they made would work better.  Currently, that fitness tracking device is sitting at 2.3 stars after 93 reviews.  Not very good at all.  That product is so bad, they have slashed the price down to $49 AND you can get another 20% off of that.  CAN YOU SAY LIQUIDATING INVENTORY.  Not a good sign Kemosabe,  Unfortunately, this scale is no better in my opinion than the tracking device and is subpar all the way.  Honestly, I think it is the company that is failing.I will give 2 stars for being able to set it up relatively easily and that it actually does display A weight.  Notice how I say, A weight, and not your weight.  I stepped on and off of this thing 5 times and got 5 different results with a spread of 5 pounds.  Huh?Did you know this scale will give you the temperature and humidity reading where it sits on the floor?  Who cares what the temperature is at ground level, not to mention the humidity.  It's not like I sleep on the floor and sit on the floor in my bathroom...for anything.  What an absolute joke that "feature" is.  How about you just give me an accurate weight reading and not the time, temp, 7 day forecast or moon phase...my phone does that...I don't need a scale to do that.And then there is the godawful app.  Mind you, iHealth seems to want to confuse the world with 2 versions, that look identical.  Get the version 2, and you will be prompted by your device to update to the regular version as they've discontinued support for this version.  Huh?  In normal terms, isn't the version 2 supposed to be the next gen version?  Whatever.  Not to mention I can't find any of my "measurements" anywhere within their app.  I have nothing reporting for weight, nothing for BMI or anything.  Yes it is supposed to sync magically with fairy dust when you connect to wifi and step on the scale.  Your weight is displayed and mystically transported through the cloud via said fairy dust to their magic servers to reside as data forever and ever.  Yet, the app won't pull down my data and has yet to display me a single measurement.Another downside is the size of this unit.  It is GIGANTIC compared to other comparable scales we have...yes, none of those connect to wifi, but they both give me BMI, body fat %, weight etc.  This thing is so big, it's like they shoved the router in each and every unit.Just as their tracker was, I'm afraid I have to report that this scale is a complete waste of money.You know what, after re-reading my own review, I have decided to downgrade from 2 stars to 1.  It is just that bad.

l had blood work done over a year ago and was informed by my doctor that I had low levels of Vitamin D and was instructed to take a daily VD3 pill.  This one was the same strength (5000IU) but in a much smaller form.  I have not noticed any decline in energy/mood having switched to these 2 weeks ago.These are so small, I would compare them to almost a bracelet bead in size.  Pop it in your mouth, swallow and your done.So far a great vitamin, at a great price and you get almost a years worth.

I was really hoping to get some great ginger flavored drink that I could latch onto and enjoy.  However, this isn't the one.  Not much ginger flavor and as a few others have reported, it appears as though Zevia has changed the formula from what was great to not so much.  It was sweet for sure, but lacking that much needed ginger flavor.
Pretty much for the teenagers who want wicked sparkle eyes or to reflect oncoming traffic lights into the night so they don't get hit.  WOW.  Might be able to use it up for Halloween.

Worked well in my Bissell Pro Heat.Our Collie of 13 years has accidents if we don't wake up early to let her out.  Rug Doctor Pro pet worked well, and this one didn't disappoint either.  I still like the lavender Nature's Miracle over these Rug Doctor scents.  These however seem to neutralize odors better than Natures Miracle.These shampoos are about twice the price as Natures Miracle though, so it really just a game of math.  With Natures Miracle you can get a gallon for nearly the same price as Rug Doctor half gallon

2 weeks into taking these and so far I am noticing a slight uptick in my daily energy levels.  I take both pills in the morning and so far, that has seemed to work great at keeping me going throughout the day.These pills are super easy to swallow not only do to size, but their thin, almost torpedo shape helps glide them down with ease.  Especially for a multivitamin, these are about the smallest I've come across.Price seems good to me.  A 60 day supply for $30...so $15 a month.  That would be on par, if not below, my current multi, so I'm really thinking I will supplement my vitamin stock with these.

I've  been shaving about 30 years and have tried a ton of systems from single blad, to 2-5 blades, straight edge razors.  I'm currently using Dollar Shave Club twin razors that cost $3 a month.  So when this came on vine and I see you get 12 razors for about $12...if I could make the razors last, it might be comparable in cost and possibly a step up in the blades.  Boy was I wrong.I use an oil to shave and every razor I've used has glided over my face without leaving a blood trail behind...even my cheapo $3 DSC dual blades have no problems and leave no blood.When I used a fresh blade out of this pack, I ended up cutting myself in 5 spots.  Mind you, I've changed nothing from shaving the day before.  I don't have a heavy beard so I was shocked when this blade left my face a bloody mess.As best as I can tell, these blades seem to clear the water/oil off before the blades are able to hit them.  There is no lube strip, but there is however a big rubber type compound at the wtop of the blades and then also at the bottom.  I think that compound at the bottom of the blade is swiping the oil off my face before the razors get to it so in effect, I'm doing an almost "dry shave".Will not use again...

After not liking their standard product over my current cleaner, when this became available on Vine, I had to try it out.  Here is our situation.  We have a 13 year old Collie.  No matter how often we let her out, she can't make it through the night all the time and will have accidents.  My favorite prior to this has always been Natures Miracle...and I love their lavender scent.This in all ways, meets and or exceeds Natures Miracle in all facets.  This blue wave scent is nice, although I still prefer the lavender in Natures Miracle as it seems to linger more.This works just fine in my Bissel Pro Heat model, and I also enjoy the low to virtually no suds when I fill up the tank with water.  With other products you have to wait the bubbles to stop before you can keep filling it up with water.If you have pets and are using Natures Miracle, I recommend you give this a try.The reason for the 1 star ding is that currently, this product on Amazon is listed for $17 for a half-gallon and the Natures Miracle gallon is running only $18.If you buy the one that's cheaper as I'm sure prices fluctuate, you can't go wrong with either product.

Not overly impressed with flavors.  While I"m not a huge fan of sparkling water in general, I recognize the Izzy name from their other drinks that I do enjoy.  The main reason I shy away from sparkling water is that for all I have tried, none of them have any flavor.  So I was hoping Izzy's product would be different...but it wasn't.The fact that is "organic" honestly has no real meaning to me.  Seriously, it's water, carbonation and flavoring...how hard is that to make "organic"

Initially I thought this product worked great.  It clearly blotted out all information that I rolled over, regardless of the paper type.  Then I started looking at other products...mainly a stamp type solution using the same premise.I WAS HORRIFIED BY THE REVIEWS.All of the information you think you are blotting out is EASILY retrievable and READABLE by using a black magic marker (Sharpie, King Size) didn't matter and going over the information.  Then all  I had to do was hold it at an angle under the light, and my private information that was buried under the black ink was shining through...it was glossy and easy to read.I'm not joking and this is not a hoax.  Look at the other reviews on this type of product.  Look at my picture.  You can see the words, "DUE DATE" clear as day.  No flash was used to bring that out.Try it for yourself.Back to shredding

While I was given this blanket for an honest review, this is probably the most versatile "blanket" we own...hence the quotes around the word blanket.  First off, this is not a cloth blanket which is a great thing since sand, dirt or even food spillage tends to mess those up quickly.  This is more of a plastic weave product (kind of like that type of lawn/patio furniture) so it allows you easily hose it down, or a quick snap of your wrists to fling the blanket clean!It is also very lightweight...as in it weighs virtually nothing so you can take it to a kids soccer game, football game, picnic, outdoor party, camping, or frankly just about anywhere without a fuss.  The pockets on the side is genius to help hold your needs for the day, whether it be extra water bottles, sunscreen or even just your gadgets and headphones.This is already a staple in the trunk of our car and I would recommend you get as many blankets as you have cars...so you have one for each and it will always be on hand.

Gameplay has been outlined previously so I won't go into that here.  Overall, this is a fun game especially if you have a very vocal or shall we say enthusiastic group of players.  It's pretty much all or nothing when it comes to treasure.  The various cards with special abilities help to add some spice to the game.After a couple of play throughs, I don't much more entertainment value here.The cards are nicely designed and are of good quality.If you are new to card based games, this is a good starter set.I would recommend Dominion over this game.

Just finished using this in a section of our house that has a lot of traffic through it (between garage and family room).  I used this in our Bissel ProHeat machine and didn't really notice any difference between this higher priced solution to the various other brands.  This area of our house always leaves the water in the tank after we clean it black and this was no different.  I don't notice anything special with the Oxy clean formula.I could not smell the "Blue Wave" scent that is listed on the bottle.  Didn't do much for pet stain/odor.I did like the way the solution didn't foam, even after shaking the bottle as I filled the tank with water.  Other solutions I have used would foam while filling the reservoir tank up making it necessary to stop and wait for the bubbles to go down to keep filling with water.  This solution did not do that which was nice.If you are looking for a solution that will handle pet stains/odors or even if you looking for a more pleasant scent that you will be able to smell, I would recommend Natures Miracle Lavender.  That stuff is great.

My wife was ecstatic when this became available on Vine.  One of her friends recently returned from Israel and brought back this exact cream...just in a small tube.  Let me tell you something, she worked that tube to squeeze out every last drop.  Short of cutting it open and slathering it on from their, she used it up.She can definitely tell a difference with her hands from being dry almost irritated/chaffed to soft and smooth after using this.As others have noted, there is a scent...but it doesn't bother her or me.  So to each their own.  If scents bother you, then you need to look elsewhere.

I will admit up front that the only reason I chose this for Vine was for comical reasons.  There was absolutely no way I would ever buy a product like this so I thought I would give it a "swirl" if you know what I mean.  Of course, we are all familiar with the aerosol solutions, but a pre-spray?After doing business with a 4 spray pre-treatment, I did my business and have to say...WOW.This is some seriously strong scent to mask the stench of even the heartiest of loads.Come full on winter, it will get it's real test after I have consumed 2 bowls of my spicy hot chili.  But until then, I'm thoroughly impressed.But...still wouldn't pay $14.99 for it.

I've cooked Zatarain's rice on many occasion and it never fails to be one of our favorites  Always seems to come out just right, not sticky or mushy.
