The Ultra Man 50+ contains several ingredients that the name brand equivalent, that I've been taking for a long time, does not.  T,he price is much higher but, hopefully, you get what you pay for.

This Moko case is exactly as described.  The built-in design for vertical and horizontal stands are both well positioned and sufficiently stable.  The camera feature  can be used while in this case, and all controls (input, volume and on/off ) are also available  When turned on, the Kindle Fire 10 does go into sleep mode when the case is closed - and then does wake-up when the case is opened again.  The case appears to be very well made, solid protection for my Tablet, should last for  years, and it looks like it costs more than the under $20.00 (Prime members) that I paid for it.My only criticism, that I can think of right now, is that the clasp that holds the case closed makes the case hard to open,  While I'm a bit annoyed by this, it does  prevent the case from opening by accident.

Being. 77, of course I had some trouble connecting the unit to the underside of my desk.  I had to partly disassemble the desk and put the top. down on my rug to get the job done.  So, after I got my life back from all that killing work, I felt great. It really is perfect for my use.  Both the keyboard shelf and the mouse pad work perfectly, and fit my desk.without any special adjustments.  The quality is better than the one that came with my desk  It became unusable after eleven years.  This one will out last me.

I like the BLU Advance 4.0 because it works as advertised, and it was easy to  transfer my Motorola flip-phone chip to it  But buying it was a mistake for me.  I only use it as a call phone and a Pocket watch, and maybe a camera when I don't have a better camera with me.  After checking out all the features, I found little of interest to old me.  But younger people who are more on the go, and more social, should find this to be a nice budget smart phone,

Webroot has caught many threats to my computers.  It works automatically and can also be worked manually. Their are also some settings that users may choose from that may cover some special concerns.  It is fast as it is configured.  But I found one threat that it had missed by going directly  to the whole operating system, C: drive, and start the app from there.  It took a long time to run that way, and it only caught one threat.  I plan to use it this way only twice a year.  And I will renew my contract soon.UPDATE - 10/17/15:All of the above is or was true, I'm jut angry with them.  The CD they sent me would not accept the Product Code, the on line  help is all robotic.  I wasted two hours and got nowhere.  I'm leaving the 4-STARS posted, but I'm sending the software back and changing my digital security to Norton.

Timeless Quotes is good reading, especially when readers know they will be interrupted a lot ..  I hadn't read many of the quotes before.  Some are hilarious.  Some wake the mind and even inspire.  I also appreciate the background informaati0on given for each. person quoted.  .

Made in China, or I should say, beautifully made in China, my Canon EOS M. Camera, with 18 - 55mm lens.is a good fit.  The case is well padded for camera safety, and I wouldn't be worried about rain - but do not submerge..  It has  storage space for an extra battery or two, extra SD Memory Cards, and a lens cloth.  The largest compartment is zippered under the lid, and a smaller one, not zippered, is inside the case body.  (a lens cloth comes with the case.).  Their is a shoulder strap that is quick to attach and just as quick to un-attach..  A handle, for carrying the camera case, without the shoulder strap, is connected outside the zippered lid...This camera case is slow to get the camera out.  The zippered lid must first be un-zipped.  The case is designed to be as small as possible, fitting like it does with my Canon EOS M camera.  Not designed for speedy camera access, it is especially built to  keep safe whatever camera fits.

I'm not any kind of entrepreneur.  I just wanted to learn some current business perspectives.  I was surprised to find so much information in this one book.  I believe that reading it would benefit most anyone.  Certainly young people, but also those with a few years of experience.I did disagree with the title, but that's just nit-picking.Most every page drips with information that was new to me, and unexpected.  Like a couple of  pages explaining the common sense investing in new inventions.  In part, t goes something like:: don't invest in a new invention just because it is vastly superior to what is available in stores.  People may be satisfied with what is already available and not motivated to purchase anything new.

Epson makes superb computer printers, and the Epson  Expression ET-2500 EchoTank is not an exception.  The only problem in the past (for me)has been in ink supplies, and the cost per page of photo prints.Previous Epson printers were priced lower than this one.  Epsom could do that because they profited from expensive ink cartridge sales.  But this printer comes with two years of ink supplies - expensive cartridges not needed.  (note that  the ink supplied, with the printer, is equivalent to 20 cartridges, or 5 complete sets.)  Just  squirt ink into the reservoir containers.  Epson gets their rightful profits up front, and also makes printing more affordable  .In fact, when initial supplies are used up, users can use any brand of inks of the same quality.  And sticking with Epson inks should also be very affordable.  Users will have a choice.You should also know that Epson has built-in this feature into a whole line of new printers.  While this one is probably ideal for most consumer users, you may have special needs and prefer one of the others.  .I think this is the fastest printer I've ever owned, and the image quality is the best. The only problem that I have found so far is that the printer won't t print edge to edge on 4"X6" photo paper, and these unwanted boarders are not the same on all sides.  Epson will probably fix this when they update the app, but I don't know this for sure.

This Stun Gun is almost indistinguishable from a regular neat little flashlight.  It's about the same size, but lighter than similar ones available, and the light is quite bright none the less.  On the front, a hood makes the Stun Gun parts invisible, and it easily comes off if you really want to use it to stun an attacker - or scare off a dog.  . It can be used as a regular flashlight with the safety switch turned to on, or off, for the Stun Gun. It come with only a  one foot charging wire that plugs directly into a standard US wall plug. No bulky transformer is needed.I almost forgot: this Police model is not only excellent, it was priced lower than any others that I could find from Amazon - and delivery was super fast.  ..This is IMPORTANT according to the included instructions:  Avoid over charging the battery.  Charge the battery for only one hour a month - two if you use the flashlight a lot.  Do not operate the stun gun to display the stun for more than one second - it can burn out if you are not using it to stun someone.  Using it on an attacker, you can stun repeatedly.

Of course buyers will have differing camera equipment that may fit this case.  I use my own in this review only as an example:This Case Logic case fits my Canon EOS 700-D (T5i) camera body, with the Sigma 18MM-250MM zoom lens mounted on camera (and with tulip sun shade turned around, UV filter, and lens cap on).  Without  a Battery Grip, it makes a perfect fit.  But their  isn't enough room for a Battery Grip.There are three zippered compartments on the outside of  the case, and one zippered pocket on the inside - under the zippered lid.  The zippers are very tough and durable, and the compartments provide plenty of storage space for small accessories.  I say small, but the front compartment is large enough to easily hold my Canon Speedlite 270EX.Everything is well padded.  This including the shoulder strap which has a moveable pad for comfort.  There is also a handle at the top for carrying the case with or without the strap.Clearly, this case is built to provide solid safety in transporting expensive cameras and accessories.  For camera safety, case durability, and good looks. it is worthy of the Case Logic name.

I choose this lower priced Massage Roller because I thought I would have limited use for it.  But I find it to be of excellent quality and, I believe, as good as any.  Seven rollers spin separately as the Muscle Stick is glided over the targeted areas.  Of course the user is in full control of pressure applied.  The stick is really strongly built and will certainly last for many years of use.  While a partner could be of use to reach difficult areas of the  body, it remains very useful without one.

I'd like to make some comparisons of Remington's PF7500 with Panasonics ES81035.  To start with, the Remington's appearance kind of reminds me of a tank, while the Panasonic has a shiny silver finish  and an artsy curved handle.  Both use lithium batteries, floating heads (Panasonic's is more flexible), pop-up trimmers, head guards, and power adapters.  The Panasonic can be used in the shower,  The Remington can have it's head washed in water but cannot be submerged.  Both should be dry before each use.  I purchased the Panasonic on sale for $59.98.  That's close to twice what the Remington costs.I can't know the lifespan of either, but the performance is about the same.  I've been shaving one side of my face with the Panasonic, and the other side with the Remington.  . The Remington did a shade better on my turkey neck, and the Panasonic did a shade better on my wrinkled cheeks.  I'm satisfied with both for quality of shaves.Here's a tip to get the most comfortable shaves: I use a lubricant like a jell or a regular old fashioned shave cream as a shaving prep.  I can even do this with the Remington because its head can be cleaned with running water.  I found no problem using the same shaving prep on both electric shavers.I like this Remington shaver: it can be used plugged into the wall or on  battery. The Panasonic works only on battery.  While I like my Panasonic a bit better, the quality of shaves is near identical - and the price is close to half.  I'm glad to have the Remington shaver as my back-up.  .I.believe these are most of the pertinent facts.  LOL
I especially like beautiful documentaries, and the Smithsonian Channel has some of the best.

I don't know if I should say it's cute or elegant.  It is both.  And it looks good with my white dishes.  I like to have a sense of super cleanliness when I sit down to eat, or to just have a cup of tea.

These PUR faucet refills not only make my water taste better, they, among other things, filter most of the lead and mercury that may be in the water,  The faucet PUR device they fit is smart looking and easy to use.  And I get the best price from Amazon by ordering 3-Packs.

Purchased refurbished:: Very easy to install, and it works well in my small apartment.  A higher powered WiFi adapter would only increase range.  Data transfer speed is more important to me, and the Cisco Linksys AF2500 is fast enough.

Presently, I use the Bluetooth transmitter function with my Sony CD Walkman, my portable radios, and my Bluetooth headphones.  It works great.  It upgrades all my old portable sound equipment.  Other possible uses come to mind, I just haven't got around to them yet.
I think $25,00 was a good price for this name brand (SanDisk)  64GB memory card.  .

If you only need a micro-SD Card, this one appears to work as advertised.  But if you need to share data  between this card and a standard SD Card, Reader, and you do not have an adapter, it can be a problem.  Yes, most people already know this. So t the important thing is that this little memory card is fast and reliable.  With these attributes,, I find no fault - yet!  .
It works as advertised.  It's low in cost.  It's plug and play on my Windows 8.1  I had no problems pairing with Bluetooth Headphones, so that proves that both of them work.

I had no trouble pairing with my desktop computer running Windows8.1. .  I had just upgraded the computer with a USB plug-in Bluetooth device, so that proved that both the headphones and the USB device work..  I  also noted that the annoying  sound of my refrigerator was not noticeable while I was listening to music.  And the sound quality also is rather good.I'm not used to this kind of fit for a headphone, and that annoys me a bit.  But not having a wire dangling from it does, for me, make-up for this shortcoming.  The padding for the ears is good.  It's lightweight, but looks strong enough for normal use.  I would not want to wear it while skateboarding, but I'm 76.UPDATE  6/15/15I was trying to fit the headphones on backwards.  I'm now satisfied with the strength of the fit.  Truly, for this price, this is a bargain.For an L-Cheapo headphone the SoundBot SB220, is an excellent choice.

The Ziploc Space Bags arrived this morning and I put one of them to immediate use.  I live in a small one bedroom apartment and I will quickly make use of the rest of the bags.  I'm grateful to get them at no charge - just for being a Vine Reviewer.  I'm using the Ziploc Space Bags to compress my Winter bedding,  and much of my Winter clothing  If I didn't like them, or could not put them to good use,  I'm free to say so.These bags are super strong and easy to use.  Just (1) fold the cloth goods you wish to shrink for storage inside and Ziploc closed; (2) attach the vacuum cleaner hose;  :(3)  turn the vacuum cleaner on; (4) when the goods are fully reduced in size, turn off the vacuum cleaner ; and (5)  remove the vacuum cleaner hose.  (A one way valve will immediately close, preventing any leaks.)  The resultant package will be reduced to  about a third the original size.  The items stored will be protected from moisture, odors, mildew, and bugs.  I'm storing mine under my bed. As winter returns, I will open the bags and put my winter stuff to immediate use as needed.  They should be as fresh as they were when put in storage.  I'll still have some things in storage in the Fall, Spring, and Summer.  Happily,  the bags are reusable.

I use this mainly for fun.  But I also use it in my car, and on my person, to document any unexpected problems.  I guess I'm a bit paranoid.  Anyway, the camera makes photos and videos at  surprisingly high resolution.  The lens is wide-angle, f2.2.  It can be used as part of a home security system.  The included accessories allow for many kinds of camera attachment.  Lithium battery and charger are also  included.  And the price is right.But people should understood that this type of camera is soon to be greatly improved.  The technology is there.  The customer demand is there.  In just a few weeks, or months, the improved products must appear.

A great collection of Beethoven's works.  I downloaded it  as an Amazon Prime Customer -  at no additional charge (FREE).  How could I not love it?  And being a Prime customer brings me a huge bundle of other albums, videos, movies, apps, and even super fast delivery of many products.

I purchased this Mini USB Wi-Fi plug-in to make my old desktop computer communicate with my newer desk top computer network.  It's not the fastest available, but it is cheap, fast  enough, and it is easy to install.  I've plugged the secondary desktop computer into my 32" Smart LED television.  My purpose was to  unite all of my electronics.  This does the job.

I tried this free download.  Some people who have moved away from earlier Windows to Windows 8.1 miss the old start key.  I've already adjusted to Windows 8.1 and see no advantage to this add-on set of functions.  But it is less than  9MB in size, so if users want to go backwards for comfortt, they may like this.  Personally, I look to when Microsoft makes Window 10 available.  But if you want to take time to try this, it is easy to add on to Windows 8.1,  and it's equally easy to take it off.

A tough canvas bag, it's a bit larger than I expected.  The main compartment zipper looks tough, and their also is  one small zippered compartment.  It's sure not fancy, but it is sure to last.  It has three ways to carry:  Neck Strap, Center Hand Grips, and a Bottom End Hand Strap.  Reasonably good appearance.

Over the years I have tried  to find an electric shaver that was at least as good as an old fashioned blade.  So I mostly used a blade.  But with the Panasonic ES8103S Arc3 Electric Shaver Wet/Dry, I have found real perfection.  It's better than a blade,  I guess the difference is mainly the nanotechnology.  Whatever, I have finally found the perfect shaver at a really good price.The best shaves has been wet.  I used a cheap foam, purchased from the Dollar Tree Store.  With my old turkey neck, it would be impossible to get a closer or more comfortable shave. I easily get 10 shaves per one charge if I want, but in the future I plan to charge all my electronics on Sundays.  If I forget, a 5 minute charge would give me one full shave  This is one electric shaver that will not disappoint.UPDATE 6/11/15:Just wanted to add that I stopped using shaving foam and started using a Dollar Tree Store  hand and body lotion.  Wash your face first or not, it's so smooth.

This Linksys Wi-Fi Router is built for people who need maximum speed to support several users, even in buildings with two, or possibly even three floors.  It comes ready with open source programing, duel antenna, and cable for computer connection.  .  .  .

I need not say a lot: The Kryptonite Kryptolok  is the state of the art when it comes to consumer bicycle protection.  If you have to leave your bicycle outdoors night or days, unless you have a big dog, you should consider owning one of these killer locks.

In my entire 76 years of life, I have never gotten my equipment wet or dropped a camera or any electronic anything.  I purchased this protection plan only because my newly acquired little sports camera will be getting killer use, and because the price of protection was under eleven dollars for two years.I'm a lifetime amateur photographer and do have lots of expensive equipment, but I know how to protect all of it.  With this little bitty sports camera, I plan to give it only minimal protection with maximum use.  It s therefore is a high risk item and so insurance may be justified.  .If I ever have to make a claim, I will post the results.

Adjustment straps built into the design gave me a perfectly secure fit.  Big kids should like it too - it looks hot but not too showy.  I doubt that anyone could do better with price, design, and quality with a well respected brand name.

Front and back LED lights, that even show from the SIDE, are critical for night riders most everywhere.  these adjustable lights are fully adequate.  The adjustable 5 LED's in front are amazingly bright, and last for a long time on AAA batteries.  The rear light is okay, but pedal reflectors, and whatever else you can manage to be seen at night, is recommended.Also, here in Southern Oregon, accessories will be stolen from secured bikes parked in public places -  even for only a few minutes.  With these lights, owners simply install the quick on and off connectors to the bike, and take the lights with them when parking in public places.  .
PROBLEMS

I made a big mistake.  I ordered this protective case for the HT One M9,  in exchange for an honest review.  But it was an accident.  I don't own thisSmart Phone.  It is similar in size and shape to my BLU ADVANCE 4.0, but the controls differ completely.I can only report that this Case, the Otter Defender, is strongly built and should be a real protection for the intended Smart Phone, the HTC One M9.  This is an expensive phone and probably should be protected from damage if rough environments for use are anticipated.Please excuse me for my error.

Manufactured in China, USA Dealer delivered to Oregon in only three days.This tricycle comes with all three wheels fully balanced and spoked from rims to ball bearing center mechanisms.  The tires are fully inflated.  In addition, the ball steering stem  is fully installed, as is also the pedal cranking mechanism.  While  the instructions assume adult bicycle experience, it is written in clear and correct English - and every single little part is both named and illustrated.  Recommended is final adjustments of brakes and gearing mechanism by a bicycle shop  expert mechanic.  (I won't need this.)Arriving today, it took me more than two hours to take the parts out of the box and remove all the packing material.  Really, only experts could have performed this packing to get the trike completely undamaged from China to Southern Oregon, USA.I'm old and this is as far as I have gone today - I'm tired.  I'll get back to update this review after I finish assembly and after I try it out for a few days.  Meanwhile, I can say that this is a very heavy and very strong trike, and it is well designed for use by seniors going shopping, or maybe going  to the dog park.  When used sensibly, it should be safe to use here in Medford and in most small towns.As for all the work, if you do it yourself, their is no additional charge.Update as promised: 14 May 2015Assembly has been much more difficult than I expected.  But after finally accomplished I can say it has been worth the trouble.  Just know that help in assembly may be needed, and this comes with labor costs.Note if you live in the Western US, it may be advisable to install puncture resistant linings in the tires - or other available protection.  This is to protect against Stag Horn Birrs.
Low price, suitable for most data storage, but maybe not for video's.  Good judgment, without over kills, give smart shoppers better deals like this one.

I personally like this shower curtain, but it does cause me to wonder.  100% Polyester, and with extra layers at key points for improved strength, it is as well built as any I have ever used.  The curtain is semi-transparent, and that's alright, but the design is a floral lace - reminiscent of my grandmothers lace table cloth.Okay, it's pretty and well made.  If the price suits you, the only question left is: will this semi-transparent, grandmother's lace shower curtain fit in with your bathroom's motif?

I purchased this product at a reduced price, not for what it can do now, but for what it may be able to do in the future.  Right now I can use it to get  local weather  reports, answers from a dictionary or Wikipedia - and I can use it to play some of my favorite music. I would not benefit from buying this as it stands.  I already have better ways for these uses.  But Amazon.com is already adding more software updates to the Echo.  Most importantly, the Echo's are controlled by the Amazon Cloud.  Operating System.  This gives it infinite storage for infinite  possibilities.  Owning an Echo is  possibility an opportunity to follow the development, maybe even share input, of true artificial intelligence  And all this while benefitting from every step.I like it but: clearly  the Echo is too futuristic to deliver instant gratification at this time.  "You pay your money and you take your chances."'  This has always been the situation with Pioneers.

This is so great.  It's easy to install, easy to use, and with Prime gives me a world of entertainment at no additional cost - or at occasional low cost for special things like Net-Flex offerings.  All this on my great big LED TV. Now I only use broadcast television with my Internet.  With this Stick I don't have any use for cable TV. This saves me a lot of money and gives me more and better choices for entertainment.

Because I'm 76 this device is a hassle for me to put on; but it's truly worth the trouble.  I got it for a hammer toe on my left foot and it does separate my toes sufficiently to avoid the recurrence of an ulcer, and the pain it caused when I walked.  Now I wont need surgery.  What a relief.  There was a worry that  poor circulation might be inadequate to allow healing from the surgery.But an unexpected bonus was the cushioning for the ball of my foot.  On my left foot I have what my podiatrist called a metatarsal neuroma.  Two grouped sets of  nerves crisscrossed on the ball of my foot and has been a pain I had adjusted to.  To my surprise, this device gives me the extra padding that  eliminates that pain altogether.Problem feet come in many forms.  I'm just reporting my own good luck using this device.  May you have as good luck as I have had.

First, I weigh 160 lbs. and have smaller wrists than most other men my size - and this size fits  perfectly.This wrist support is better than the ACE brand equivalent that sells in stores for $19.95.  I'm 76 and have a painful left wrist caused by carpal tunnel damage.  Compared to the ACE brand, this brace is better built and better designed for longer lasting use.  The ACE  brand brace gets awful looking, and looses support at the base of the thumb, within three months of use.  While I haven't warn this one for any length of  time, it is obviously superior.

This Seagate Hard Drive has everything I wanted: high speed, portability,large capacity solid build and quiet running.  And coming from a highly rated manufacturer, who could ask for anything more?Of course Cloud Servers have also become popular,  But since I don't use one I can't make comparisons.  But it does seem to me that carrying a portable hard drive  is better than having to find Internet service to access files - at least for me.  I'm also kind of paranoid when I comes to privacy and security. Actual cost and individuals needs are also factors.Using Windows 8.1, USB 3, and a desktop running at 3 .1 GHz,, I simply copied my photo, video, music and Document file folders - and whatever.  This took me about fifteen minutes.

If you really need a special foam seat to use for sitting many hours a day, I guess this one is well worth the money.  But I have had an enlarged prostate for the last 50 years, so I thought this unit  might have some magical  effect.  But I just don't sit that much to feel benefitted.  Not yet anyway.  I'm not saying that this is not a useful and well made appliance, it is both of these.  My only real criticism is that it moves around  my seat and requires occasional adjustments.  That and the fact that I really don't feel a personal benefit.  Don't hate me for honestly saying my mind.

This keyboard fits perfectly with the X2 I- pad Air2.  It might also be useful with other units using  Bluetooth technology, but I'm not sure of that.  I do like the way it folds up to cover the keys when not in use.  It charges from zero to full in about 4 hour's.  The keys have a nice feel and register well whout overly sensitive repeating.  And the price is right.

This book is sharply divided into a thousand things or events.  I've been using the Kindle HD download to read  each as commercials interrupted my televising watching.  I find about as many to be interesting as I also find to be not so interesting. It's sort of a Believe it or Not series.  Anyway, it fits into my life style until finished.  Maybe other readers would make use of this either the same as I do - or maybe put it for use in the bathroom.  Clearly the author, Reagan Musyoka, is a great champion among all liars.  .
Of course this is a great album.  All music written by Mozart is great, and the Franz List Chamber Orchestra is excellent.

I give these shoes 5-STARS because of the special price ($41.97) with free Prime Shipping.  Oh yah, the quality is excellent and I'm very satisfied with the way they fit.  They are as good as the $79.95 shoes (on sale for  $59.99) that I've been wearing.The range of shoe wideness gave me enough confidence to make this purchase.  That and their return policy.

This player works beautifully in Stereo.  I had thought the built in speaker on my Kindle HD was quite good, but with this Bluetooth Speaker the sound is extraordinary by comparison.  Even the bass sounds better than expected.The unit is solidly built.  Its built-in FM radio is a little tricky to use.  Moving it around helps lock on to stations.  It also plays using my MiroSDHCUHS-1 Memory Card.  I already have a 32GB Sony Card filled with my favorites.  The unit even plugs into my Sony CD player (with the included cable).  Another included cable is for charging the unit.  It can be charged by USB  or with a wall plug-in charger that  I have for something else.The player shipped from China so it took almost two week for delivery, but it's well worth the wait.

My Podiatrist points out that this product  is quite good, but maybe not for me.  Even with open toes it still pushes the toes together,  as he demonstrated.. .I have moderate peripheral neuropathy with compromised circulation.  What goes against using this product for me is that I also have a troublesome hammertoe.  Just  the same, I'm trying it off and on and under close watch. I have scheduled minor surgery that should correct the problem with the hammertoe.  Healing from surgery will then be my main concern, and that takes healthy circulation support.  He also recommends massageUPDATE 12 March 2015It looks like I won't need the surgery on my hammertoe.  A simple rubber O-ring shape of a soft rubber seems to be just what I needed - and a little wider shoes.  And I am also able to use this compression hose to improve circulation - I just have to fold it back toward my arch as I slide it on  Also of merit has been my 15 minute  hot water soaking of my feet. ..

Yes, the sound quality really is quite good for its size.  Furthermore, it is attractive, strongly built, and I think the price is reasonable.  I give it 5-STARS.  I like it.  The more I use it, the more I like it.  Better sounding Blue-Tooth speakers may exist, but they are more expensive and considerably larger.  This one is designed for both outdoor and indoor portable use, and does a great job.I have only tested this on my Kindle Fire. The Kindle sounds petty good without this external Bluetooth speaker.  It just sounds a lot better with it. In my opinion, it's usually worth being an extra carry-on accessory.UPDATE 1 April 2015I am now seeing many Bluetooth players in local stores.  What a great selection.  While this unit is quite good, I now believe customers can find more desirable players at very good prices by shopping around.  You might find one that you alike best that is also sold on Amazon, or other Internet stores at improved prices.  It's a buyers market.  .

The twin sized mattress arrived this morning.  It was compressed down to a little larger than  the size of the duffel bag I had when  I was in the Air Force.  I'm 76 and live alone, so it was a bit of a challenge for me to set-up.  Thankfully, my efforts yielded a comfortable bed to have a nice nap.  Actually, the mattress  could  have been set-up by an average sized young woman with no problems.The mattress is two sided so it can be used when  turned over come spring cleaning time.  This adds to the life of a mattress.  While shopping around, I've seen some slightly cheaper mattresses for sale that were only one sided, and they weren't even nearly as comfortable.This is actually the most comfortable mattress I have ever owned..  I'm well pleased.Shoppers should also read other opinions, but I think most will agree with me.  This mattress is definitely worth the price.  I paid $149.00 and got free shipping as a Prime Member. It was not gifted to me as a Vine Reviewer.  Even if it were, my reviews are not guided, they are my own opinions.UPDATE: 2/6/15Okay, I've slept on this mattress a little over a week now.  Yippee!  I now fall asleep quicker and  awake in 8 hours feeling refreshed.  This is what I really needed.  I do know that even better mattresses exist, but this one is really great for the price.

I prefer  this style of headphones for convenience and portability.  I do have better, and more expensive headphones, for use at home.  But I thank that the Amazon Premium Headphones do produce the best sound of any I have owned of this style.  I do like it.

I received this really nice external power bank (P100 SCUD External Battery) free - for only my promise to write an honest review.  My criteria for rating is not only for the quality of the product, but also my level of enthusiasm for usefulness and price listed on Amazon.  Not having  a technologist background in electronics, I  ignore most of the technical stuff.  .Yes, the P100 works as expected.  This is a great carry along for hikers or bikers who carry a tablet and/or a cell phone.  It's even useful for  some flashlights and other small rechargeable electronics that might need charging before reaching home or car.  These are all the uses that I wanted it for.  But for general travel use, I have cheap adapters to charge everything with my car battery or my lead acid emergency carry-on power source.Charging time for the P100 is slow - 8 hours to fully charge the battery starting at zero.  Time for the P100 to charge the batteries of small devices depends on the capacity of the unit and how much charge it still has left.  But of course, it isn't necessary to fully charge electronic devices in order to use them.The P100 is charged using the standard/micro USP connector cable (supplied).  It fits one way to charge the P100 from a PC, and is reversed to charge from the mini adapter end.  (I have a home A/C wall plug-in that works for charging my cell phone at home, and it works for charging the P100 too.)  The P100 has overcharge shut off protection.  Smallish LED's indicate level of charge at various capacities, both when charging and also when discharging.  (button is pressed when discharging.)  The P100's build is very smooth and handsome, but  none the less, it requires careful handling to avoid dropping or getting it wet.  Temperature range for use range from 45 degrees C, down to 10 degrees C.I would recommend this product to my friends.
NPR News is on a par with other radio news programs as far as I am concerned.  It is always brief and spoken softly and without artificial dramatic overtones.

I was given this product (without cost)  by a seller who asked me to review it on this Amazon site.This device does many things - poorly and with too many complications.  For home security I would want one system that did only the relevant functions.  I would not want it displayed as a digital clock for a thief to  unknowingly drop into his pocket while grabbing cash, computers, etc...  I would not want the entertainment functions incorporated into the unit.  I have other electronic products that do these jobs better.  What I would want is something that was totally hidden and would be turned on remotely using only one button.  Then I would be able to view my place on the Internet remotely.  Yes, I would have to pay more than this unit costs.This 4-in-one device is annoyingly and unnecessarily complicated.  Yes, all I could figure out how to use does work; but it falls short as a home security device.  It's attempts to take on other functions actually detracts from the effectiveness of its main purpose.  This is more of a toy than an effective home security device..

This how-to electronic book focusses on the greater photographic techniques that the Canon T5i was designed for. That is, all except the video functions.  It states this clearly right up front.  Furthermore, the reader should read the User Guide that comes with the camera first - or at least read both books' applicable sections as the camera is put into use.As the title would indicate, this is a very well written textbook that will give those who are newly acquainted with photography enough information for  them to strike out on their own,  It is clearly written and nicely separated by chapters in logical order.  It not only covers composition and lighting, but it shows and describes some useful lens' and accessories.Persons already well versed in photography will have little use for this book, other than possibly as short chapter reviews of techniques.  But the techniques are standard for professionals and can benefit the new  and advanced amateurs.  Yes, there is much more to photography than this, but I recommend this book to those amateurs.

I broke another brand of card reader of similar design.  it worked well enough before I bent it while the Tablet was on my lap.  This is a review of the  replacement:This one feels smoother inserting the SD Card than the previous  one, and it fits my Microsoft Suffice RT without sticking out quite so far.  I think it may be of better quality.  It does transfer data and photos very very quickly.Whatever, I'll be more careful with this one.

I personally like this Bumper Sticker.  Yes, it should make people smile, amd.it would - in  LA and San Francisco.  However, it is ill advised to display here in Southern Oregon,  (and maybe in some other places too). My car has already been vandalized with broken windows and with eggs, without this Sticker.  Medford seems to be the capital of homophobia and good Christians who believe that what they think is God's laws supersedes secular laws.

The Body Resistance Tube is well built for safe use and is an easy piece of equipment to carry when traveling.  I don't love it because I  still prefer my set of ribbon elastics better, even though they may not be quite as safe to use.  But that's just my personal preference.  This stretch tube is certainly worth at least the FOUR STARS as I've posted.You know what you want and maybe this is it.  It is a good choice.

Julian Bell,  being himself a writer and painter, has produced an unusually intimate view of Vincent Van Gogh.  He has done this in part by examining Vincent's letters to his brother, Theo, and matching them in the time space of his paintings.  This results in a new understanding of Van Gogh's drive to free himself to see, and render on canvas, without obstacles.  Also, the complex difficulties,  the lifestyle, and Van Gough's last days will be more widely understood by readers.I'm just a reader, not an expert in any art form.  But it seems to me that artists, who are struggling for a breakthrough in their work, might find this book to be hugely inspiring.  For the rest of us, its just a fascinating book that heightens our appreciation of art.

This will protect my Canon M with the prime lens, even with the accessory grip added on.  I don't love it because it does add a lot of bulk to tote around, but it does as it was advertised to do, and it is well made to protect the camera and last.  I'll use it, not to carry around, but to store the camera safely between use.The little pocket size tripod may be useful.  It sure is easy to take along,The lens cleaning cloth is also appreciated.
Yes, these wrist straps are as advertised.  They are the simplest design - without adjustments for wrist or hand size.  I have several uses for them so they are, for me, worth the price..

Aged 76, I've been taking fish oil supplements for several years.  In fact, I often get the Nature's Bounty brand in the 1200mg size.  Not seeing much difference, I've been shopping for price - price among reliable brand names.  But it has always been the most unpleasant of all my pills to swallow.  I have GERD and that often makes for some difficulty  swallowing.  Fish oil caps tend to turn sideways in my throat.  Taking it with food helps, but it still takes a while to go down.. I previously didn't know that this Mini size Fish Oil was available.The +: So now I can take one little capsule and get 450MG of Omega-3 instead of taking one big capsule and getting only 360MG of Omega-3.  Two capsules are recommended.  Note also that two contain 450MG each of Omega-3.  I don't know how they do this, but the Natures Bounty Brand Name is highly respected so I believe them.

At age 76, I really am not seeking a better life living on streets, parking lots, camp grounds and highways,  But I do have much understanding of this.  My mother lived in a car for many years, some of those with me as a child passenger.  Mother always used junk cars.  Her first was an early Model T Ford that had to be hand-cranked to get the motor to start - no motor - no lights - no nothing - only shelter.  With this she traversed from Los Angeles to New York City and back, three times before I turned three.However, I purchased this book only to get enough information to provide a back-up position should the GRID become destroyed.  For that I am satisfied.  And, on top of this, I'm now set-up to take any number of affordable trips.  Knowledge is better than money.With the information covered in this book, many alternative choices can make highway freedom available - just not to START by the aged and infirm.  But all the odd-and-ins that I have ever known, and an awful lot that I never even imagined, are revealed in this one book.  Any intelligent healthy person can make this an exciting and relatively safe way of life.  If I had all this information fifty years ago, I would, like my mother, have become owned by the highway.Maybe.

This is not my first Canon Rebel camera body, it is only the best.  I also own the T4i, which is also the best.  Yes, there are very few functions between these for photographers to discern a difference.  In my opinion, there is no need to get into those small improvements at this writing.  .Buy the best price.  I got this one for only $525.16, after shipping expense.  With Amazon carrying this seller, I acted with confidence in making the purchase,Wow, just afterwards I found another supposedly "Black Friday" T5i  priced at only $399.00.  To me this seems nuts.  Buyer beware.So, what can I tell you?  I do not use the video functions of this camera.  If I was interested in landscapes, and had the extra money, or was trying to become a professional,  I would own  a Canon camera body with a full 35mm photo sensor. All the Rebel series use a sensor size of  multiple minus 1.6." , or something like that - I'm ignorant concerning math.  Anyway, while this size is much larger than those pocket cameras and phones, it is somewhat smaller than 35mm.I was born with a very quick eye.  I made my living diagnosing a hundred  or more daily specimens to detect early signs of cancer with a microscope.  I've been retired for several years.  Now-days I shoot dogs, children, and adults in a frenzy of (socially respectable) love. These are my joy today..  The whole of the Canon Rebel series is more than enough for me to do great work covering my personal interests in photography.  Even very serious amateurs should be happily satisfied with the T5i - truely.  Just check out the specs and the prices.  And always consider the reputations of the sellers.And I almost forgot: If  you own more than one digital camera, rename your new photo files numbers so you don't accidentally over-print and loose earlier shots when you save new ones.What do I know?  Not much.  I'm just having fun and trying to be helpful to people like myself.Oh yah, follows is my favorite lens for what I use most of the time: SIGMA 50mm - 200mm zoom.  This low cost lens is quite sharp throughout its full range and has no obvious linear distortions or shortcomings that I can detect.  But I'm only comparing it with my several other lenses - all by Canon.UPDATE 30 December 2014:WOW! I now see the price on the Amazon site for this camera body for under $400.00.  This is insane.  The Canon EOS Rebel T4i is selling for a lot more, and really, the T5i is a tiny bit better. Not enough to count, but still better.  Serious shoppers should grab this while the grabbing is good.

I purchased this 12 volt car battery converter for use with my Asus X551M Notebook.  It's well made and simple to set-up and use. Before I made the connections I tested the current flow with my Digital Multi-Meter.  The digital display on my meter was as expected.  So, yah, I did.With so many adapter pieces included, this instrument may even be useful for other laptops I'll acquire in the future. But only the Shadow knows.

I've always had good luck when buying refurbished products, and this is no exception.  I guess this time I only saved a couple bucks, but that's fine.  Small savings soon add up, and deep cuts in big ticket items are more frequent than one might expect.

A very good controller that fits my hand easily.  The buttons are a bit sensitive and I wish they were raised just a little bit higher for optimal performance. But for the most part, I really like how everything is set up.  Their are two cons with this controller.  One  is that I can't use it with my headset. Two, it's not wireless.  The wire is about 10 feet, but I prefer wireless.  I like to play online a lot and unfortunately I won't be using this awesome controller to do so. But for solo offline game, this suits very well.  If they make it compatible with a headset and wireless, I would gladly purchase it.

Thomas lovers will definitely want to add this unique track to their collection.  The wooden track is easy to set up and only takes a few minutes. The mill has a cargo dropping zone and the water mill spins, but the real winner is the xylophone track - it plays the Thomas Theme music as it goes over the track. Well, it's supposed to be but you really have to pay attention to understand that is what it is, but the kids love it.  Hours of fun and with other tracks in our house, they are using their imagination and putting all sorts of things together on their train table. A good quality item that also comes with Thomas the train and a cargo car.  Hours and hours of fun!

I am in love with the look of this watch.  The face is very easy to read and the date is there as well. However, when the time is on the half hour, you can't read the date until it moves. Also, the date is very small.  So you have to almost squint to read it, when you can.  The leather band is very handsome and really adds some class to this watch - could be worn for any event or function.  The crystal is really small but it is there. It comes in a very sturdy case, which is great while storing your watch.  Inexpensive watch that looks great and keeps the time.

Beautiful, delicate, simple necklace.  I love the Infinity and lariat design!!  The tiny CZ just accents the heart.  Lovely sheen to the silver and the chain is a good 18" with the extender.  It took me awhile to untangle the chain before I could wear it, but other than that, it's a really lovely item.

I love this necklace! The detail on the pendent is very well done.  The amethysts are really secure and it really adds delicacy to this stunning piece.  The chain and pendant are very lightweight.  It's very easy to forget you're wearing a necklace at all with how light it is.  The amethysts are set off brilliantly with the silver cross and chain. I may look for an extender for this necklace.  It is 18' but I prefer a bit more length.  Good price for the quality.

I wish I knew these existed before now! I love it very much!! It holds six plugs and I can do away with the power strip.  Much safer!! Not to mention, my electronics charge much faster. There are also indicator lights so you know it's working.  You won't have to worry about this slipping off of the wall either as it screws into the mount.Definitely going to purchase one of these for the office.  Love it!! It simplifies my life.

My daughter loves this game! She is a big Adventure Time fan and  has many objects with the characters on them so she was really loving these cards.  The illustrations are top notch, colorful and really capture the characters.  The game is very easy to play and it's fun.  The cards can be kep in the adjoining box for easy storage.  Fluxx took me a bit to understand how to, but once I did, I became a fan.  A lot of fun !

This bath mat is very nice and luxurious.  It has been used for a few weeks now and even with many washings, there are no loose threads. The mat is plush and the 'ribbing' style gives it a nice simple look.  The only drawback to this mat is that it isn't slip-resistant.  I actually added slip-resistance to it so that it isn't sliding all over.  But it is a nice mat that can be tossed in the washer and dryer without issues - the color stays consistent and there is no shrinkage.  Nice product!

This is an excellent printer! I had it from box to running in just fifteen minutes.  I hooked it up, downloaded and installed the software and was ready to print quickly.  I have spend so much money on ink cartridges - most times it is cheaper to buy a new printer than to buy ink.  But with the Epson, it comes with ink tanks and I don't have to guess how much ink is left.  The side of the printer has bars that let you know how much is left. We can print from anywhere in our house which is awesome!! And the ink quality is great (no smearing, consistent ink) and the printer is very fast.  We are very satisfied with the printer and are looking forward to saving money on ink cartridges.

This is a nice shower curtain.  It doesn't come with the hooks unfortunately, but it is very easy to keep clean.  The colors are vibrant and add some decor to the bathroom.  It just takes a few minutes to hang up and it wipes down easily.  It's not super thin easier, it's a heavier vinyl.

Four large placements that are very easy to just wipe off or throw in the dishwasher.  They are very durable, yet flexible.  The colors don't bleed after washing and the artwork is very vibrant and bold.  If your kids are a fan of TMNT, they will love these! Makes meal and snack clean up a breeze!

There isn't a lot in common with Minion Game of Life with the original Game of Life.  The main goal in Minion Life is to get the bananas.  But it's a fun, quick game spinning the wheel and getting cards.  The play pieces are just too cute - small mini minions! Those are probably my favorite thing from this game.  There is some challenge, like keeping the spinner attached.  It seems to spin right off sometimes.  The challenge cards are ok but nothing that is exciting.  For younger kids, this may be loads of entertainment.  But with older kids and adults, it doesn't compare to the original Game of Life.

In this second installment of the Jess Tennant Mysteries, Jess has been in her mother's home town of Port Sentinal for three months.  She's finally settling in a bit and getting to know her cousins more. She still doesn't have any close friends and what she thought was a blossoming romance with neighbor Will was quickly shut down.Now, a boy, Seb Dawson, was found with a serious head injury along side the road.  Jess is beseeched by her cousin's friend to find out what happened to Seb and why.  Jess solved her cousin's murder just a few short months ago, almost getting herself killed.  She knows the town has secrets but many are reluctant to reveal them.  It will take some clever thinking to get to the bottom of who hurt Seb.Once Jess gets a hold of something, she doesn't stop.  She's a great character who has a good relationship with her mom.  She's also pretty private; when she meets someone knew she doesn't tell them her whole life story and she is very quick with the intelligent questions and charming wit.  A young adult mystery page-turner for all ages, I can't wait to see what adventure Jess takes me on next!

I never knew putting something so nice together would be so easy! A box weighing about 112 pounds was shipped to us but with a little help from my son we maneuvered it into the house.  It took about fifteen minutes to unpack and assemble the sofa.  There is no screws or nails involved, no tools at all.  The brackets are already attached to the pieces, so it become a matter of sliding the other parts in and using slight force to lock them into place.  The material is very soft and the sofa is deep and plush.  The paperwork says that it should hold 225 pounds per side, but I weigh a bit more than that and had no problem sitting on it.  It's very sturdy.  Although it says it is grey with white piping, I would say the piping is more of a silver or light grey.  It's really beautiful.  Having a cat, I can see where cat hair will become a problem with the nubby fabric, but we'll just use a roller for now and see how it goes going forward.  I wouldn't sit three on this sofa though unless they are smaller. Two adults can sit comfortably.  Beautiful piece, easy to assemble and the wooden feet just add charm.

Despicable Me Edition Board Game is a fun-filled family game fit for all ages that families can enjoy: choosing which team color of minions movers that you want to take control of. or traveling around the board and trying to roll for Silent Bob so no one can send your minions back to the beginning. This board game is a must have for any Despicable Me fans out there. The only negative issue that I found about the game is that you need a hammer just to be able to press down on the Pop-O-Matic. This makes it extremely difficult not for just children, but for adults as well. The Pop-O-Matic is also not attached to this cardboard version of a board and the pieces are easily knocked off the board. The game is poorly made even though the Despicable Me minions is a cute idea. The game is still fun and enjoyable, but is also poorly executed.

A very large place mat that is made of very durable, yet flexible BPA Free Plastic with bright, vivid colors.  Frozen is all the rage right now (still?) and my niece just adores it! Clean up is a breeze; just a quick wipe with a sponge, or throw it in the dishwasher.  I'm happy that four come in the pack, as all the kids can use one when they are eating and make clean up fast and keep my table debris free.  Great design and product!

A nice, bold print that didn't flake or fade after a wash and dry cycle.  A nice, standard size and so far no pilling or loose threads. They aren't as absorbent as I'd like but would be great for a starter home.

I'm a curtain junkie.  It's a quick and easy way to change the look of any room.  I have to admit, I don't just use shower curtains in the shower.  My favorite placement for them is to remove closet doors and hang them there.  A quick adjustment of an adjustable shower curtain rod, and any doorway can be brightened up.  To my way of thinking, you can't have too many to mix and match and change looks.  So, I was really excited to check this one out.Though it isn't handmade lace, the machine stitching is exquisite.  There aren't any snags or missed marks.  It's sturdy, yet lightweight.  The best part is, if your cat climbs up, he won't leave any claw marks!  Where you insert the hooks at the top, there is a stiff binding so it holds shape and drapes nicely.  There's a lovely scallop around the sides and bottom that add a touch of elegance to it.Whether just brightening up your shower or adding to other curtains for display, this is a good buy.  It's machine wash and dry, so easy care.  It doesn't tend to wrinkle so you can store it and pull it out whenever you'd like.  I placed mine behind two other shower curtains for an added touch of grace.

I've heard great things about Essie, so I was really excited to try their nail color.  I was quickly disappointed.  It is very thin, and although I used two coats, it was still inconsistent.  I used a base, two coats of polish and a top coat.  Within twelve hours, I have three chips. Usually my polish lasts for about ten days before I have to change it, but that is not going to be the case with this polish. I do like the color though, Bikini So Teeny is very close to the picture and is very pretty after applied.  I just wish it had a better consistency and didn't chip so fast.  Maybe next time.

I really like this product.  It only takes a few seconds to snap together and you're ready to use.  Just glide it over your feet and the callouses just melt away.  Then change the head to the smoother and you soon have silky smooth feet.  I've used a pedi egg for years and what would take hours of work with that only takes minutes with the Silk'n.  The only drawback to the Silk'n is that where as the pedi egg catches all of the shavings, the Silk'n has no compartment so there is a huge mess.  Be prepared to file your feet over a towel or wastebasket.

Seriously, this thing makes gardening so easy!I remember growing up that my dad was a huge advocate for Miracle-Gro.  We had the most amazing garden!  Large plump vegetables and the sweetest fruits!  As an adult, his love for Miracle-Gro has passed on to me.  It makes gardening pretty much a no-fail hobby.The problem I have is that I'm forgetful.  I don't remember when to put it on and when I do remember, well I'm just plain lazy.  It's in the shed and I don't want to walk all the way over to get it to put it on the garden.  The LiquaFeed system fixes that problem for me.  I attached it to my outside water spigot, and voila!  Easy peasy!  If I just want to use the water in the hose, I flip the switch over to 'water' and that's all that comes out.  I can water the garden or the kids can play in the water.  Then, when we're playing with the water, it's a gentle reminder that my plants need food too.  Flip a switch and I'm feeding Miracle-Gro to my hungry plants!Since it's the beginning of planting season, I haven't gotten to play around with it much.  I've got my starter plants going and I'm anxious to get them in the ground so that I can really put this to the test this year.  If it's the same Miracle-Gro I've loved my whole life, this will be the easiest gardening year for me yet.The system is light weight, yet sturdy.  It's incredibly simple to use and doesn't take up a lot of space.  When your bottle of LiquaFeed is empty, you simply uncap another bottle and screw it in.  It's as simple as those great little self-watering bulbs you put in your plants.

Our cat is inside but goes outside periodically throughout the day.  We have tried flea collars for months but it's a drain on our bank account.  He always seems to come back inside without the collar. We have bought so many different collars to deter him losing them that we were looking for a different alternative.  Fiprogaurd is it! We followed the directions exactly and within hours he stopped scratching.  Definitely a blessing to our cat and our bank account.  I love it when a product does what it boasts it can.  Great product!

This rug is VERY nice! It is 5 x 8 and lays flat with a rubber backing so it won't slip.  It's very soft and the colors are vibrant and rich.  It really adds a touch of elegance to the room.  The only complaint I have about this particular design is that it shows every piece of dirt.  I expected it to do that with a dark color but not as much as it does with the white chainlinks.  However, I just vacuum more frequently and it hasn't been a problem.  We have a cat and although he has been very nosy with it, he hasn't been able to scratch on it.  It's such a lovely, soft and plush rug that when I go to purchase another rug, I will definitely be buying Stainmaster.

This mattress came in a wonderful reusable bag.  I can't imagine getting the mattress back inside the bag once it's out, but I was able to find many other uses for it since it's both large and sturdy.After getting the mattress out of the bag, which took some tugging, I found it encased in plastic.  Boy was it fun!  As soon as the plastic was part way off, the mattress popped out like biscuits popping out of the tube!  It emerged soft and fluffy, yet firm and beautiful.I was the first one to try it out.  I laid it on the floor and dived on in.  I can honestly say that's the most comfortable nap I've had in years. The coils are shaped so that you can roll it up, but at the same time they provide just the right amount of firmness to keep you from feeling the hard ground beneath it.  The mattress padding is soft and quilted and begs you to stay on it just a little bit longer.  For the money, this is an amazing mattress.  It's comfortable and durable and easily stored away when not in use.

This is a VERY nice set of gaming headphones.  We have been using it without PS4 and PS3.  The headset fits comfortably and outside sounds are highly diminished, making the clarity very clear.  We find the controls very user friendly and the hidden mic is a real asset while gaming. It really adds more entertainment value when you can chat with others while in a game.  What we didn't like is the sensitivity of the buttons.  Just by laying the headphones down will cause power to come on and off.  We are still trying to streamline how to be sensitive to its sensitivity.  Wireless headphones with a charging mat so we aren't spending a small fortune consistently buying batteries definitely adds to the value of these headphones.

Good pot holders.  The stitching is nice and they are 100% cotton.  I like the neoprene on the back of them, it really helps prevent slippage when grabbing hot pans and handles.  I tossed them in the washer, though, like it said I could and they washed well.  But the dryer caused them to roll at the edges, so you want to make sure you air dry these.  But all in all, a good hot pad.  I didn't use over 375 degrees and though I felt warmth, it was barely noticeable.  Good hot pads, but not out of this world fantastic.

If  your children are a fan of the TV show, they will probably love Rabbids Invasion.  It's a series of mini-games with each episode.  Whomever has the most points wins.  Points can also be used to unlock other episodes.  The animation is pretty cute and the graphics are very vibrant.  Kids will love it and parents can play along with them.  However, don't take things too seriously as it becomes monotonous pretty quick - at least to the adults.  Fun game for small kids though!

I've used a tension shower rod for years and while it does the job, it's not elegant and I hate the fact that my elbows always brush up against the liner/curtain.  I work at a hotel and we recently switched to curved shower rods and the guest love them, so I was excited to get one for myself.  It only took my husband a few minutes to install it.  Just a few screws and it looks very elegant.  The shower curtain hangs really well on it, and slides just like it did with the old rod.  However, there is so much more room now in our shower/tub combo.  I know it's relative, but my arms aren't bumping into the curtain anymore.  I also like the fact that it's a rust free rod. We love it!

This is a solid coffee maker that we are enjoying immensely. I really like the fact that I can program my coffee to begin brewing and it's ready to go when I get up in the morning.  The "hot shot" water is a bonus I didn't realize I needed.  However, it's been very handy for a quick instant oatmeal, ramen noodle, and a hot tea.  I use it almost as much as I use the coffee maker.  Everything is pretty easy to clean and the drip trays come away for that purpose.  What I don't like is the fact that the warmer doesn't have it's own power switch.  It just shuts off and won't come back on until it's cooled.  All in all, though, a very nice machine that looks chic on my countertop.  Good coffee and a bonus with the hot water reservoir.

I am in love with this rug.  The backing makes it a no slip no skid rug, so I can use it on my hardwood floors without worrying about an accident.  It's a lot larger than I thought it be.  A very nice size and stepping on it is luxurious.  A very quality made rug.  The colors are very vibrant and just make the room pop.  I haven't had any loose threads and you can throw it into your washer when needed.  I will definitely be thinking of Grund when I go to make my next rug purchase.  It's like art for your floor.

The case is slim and surprisingly sturdy.  The way that the inside is designed, instead of having four pieces of elastic in the corners, there's a movable long piece at the bottom and the top.  This makes it easy enough to insert your Kindle or tablet, while keeping it sturdy and immovable.  You don't have to worry about dropping it and your Kindle flying out.  For me, the biggest problem I had with  my previous case was that my young son accidentally removed my Kindle every time he picked up the case.  Thought built for my size Kindle, the elastic tabs on the corners just weren't enough to hold it in place.Though I like how streamlined and sturdy this case is, I did have a pretty serious problem with it.  Because of the way it's designed on the inside, I can't plug my charger in while it's in the case.  For some people, this wouldn't be a problem.  However, I don't normally remember to keep my Kindle charged until I'm getting ready to use it, at which point there usually isn't much battery.  So, for me, this case just isn't usable as anything more than a transportation device when traveling.

I know how to set up a printer, so the basic set up of this HP Officejet was relatively easy for me. However, the instructions weren't hard to follow if you don't know how to set one up.  I've had an all in one machine before and I've always loved the multi-function but hadn't replaced my old Lexmark in years.  I can really tell the difference in the sleek, fast capabilities with the HP. Everything works wonderfully, and the only thing that took a bit to set up was the Neat system.  You'll be walked through how to set it up but it took me about a half an hour.  I don't use cloud but I do like the scanning/filing option for various personal reasons.  For my use, this printer is perfect.  In a professional capacity, with high volume, I couldn't say.

I have a spine disease and it's always hard to get comfortable at night.  Many mornings I wake up with neck stiffness and I've tried many different pillows.  I love down filled, but they are usually too soft and memory foam doesn't hold up well.  I've been using the Clara Clark Bamboo Memory Foam Pillow for almost two weeks now and I love it.  I haven't woken up with any neck stiffness in over a week! The pillow itself is pretty heavy, in fact, the heaviest pillow I've ever owned.  It's also thicker than a standard pillow so that took me a few days to get used to.  However, it's still firm and and I'm hoping over time, it doesn't lose that firmness by very much.  Also, it seems to be cooler than normal pillows and that's an additional bonus for me.  I will be purchasing more of these pillows so I have them for the rest of the bed and when lounging on the sofa.  Very quality made.

The powder is very light, I don't even feel like I'm wearing any make-up.  It blends beautifully and helps diminish some fine lines and darker pigmented skin (like my freckles).  I love the fashionable case and the fact that when you close it, it stays closed until you click the latch to open it back up.  That's very important to me as carry it in my purse and it's a bundle of loose items.

Black Out is a solid read.  Focused on two groups of teens, the story flips between the two groups until they are brought together for the end.  A virus, superhero powers, teen angst and more are in this scy-fy dystopian thriller.  I didn't love it, and I didn't hate it.  My main issue was the fact that I didn't relate to any characters.  Not because of the age difference, as I am an adult, but because the focus wasn't on anyone in particular, but all over the place.  The storyline is solid and the plot moved at a quick pace.  I really enjoyed the plot and enjoyed the story, I just wish there had been a bit more character development.

Smart Hydro is a great idea!  It's a great water bottle with a holder that carries your smartphone.The water bottle is made of a sturdy, pliable plastic.  It's high quality and durable.  It doesn't hold a lot, but it will hold enough to sustain you during your run.The holder is made of a soft neoprene and has velcro closure so that you can secure it snugly over your hand for the best fit possible.  It's quick and easy to position.The smart phone holder doesn't hold all phones, but it will hold most.  It's designed for iPhone 5 and Galaxy s5, so if your phone will fit those specs, then you shouldn't have any issue.  There's a clear plastic cover that allows you to use the phone as necessary while it's encased.As a running/jogging aid, this thing is awesome.  You can play your favorite music and be phone accessible while holding your hydration comfortably in your hands.  There's even a handy little spot where you can plug in ear buds.The biggest issue I had with this, is that it isn't designed for some of us with smaller hands and shorter fingers.  Though my hand fits nicely around the water bottle, I have to use my other hand to access phone features.  I think a slight change in the design on the bottle would have been handy.  Then I could use my thumb to access my phone while holding the water bottle.  Over all, though, great success and a useful gadget.

I really like these hoop earrings.  They are very lightweight.  Usually I don't wear hoops because after a few hours, they hurt my ears.  I wore these all day and forgot I even had them in.  They are so light! Very easy to snap the enclosure.  Usually with hoop earrings I struggle trying to get them closed but you can either snap the rod down into place or gently pull back on the hoop to slide it into place.  The diamond cut makes these earrings very smart and elegant.  I can wear them for business casual or for a night on the town.  Fantastic product!

I love this drying mat! It's a great, vibrant color on both sides and it not only absorbs water really well, but it also drys pretty fast.  It's a pretty large size so you can place several glasses or other wet dishes on it.  It's pretty thick but it still folds easily and flat for storage when you're not using it.  Mine seems to always be out as we do a lot of dishes!  High quality and economically priced, this is a must have for any home.

I am in love!  This is seriously the best larger-sized building block set I've encountered.When you open the box, the entire thing is in one piece.  You just pull it out, no assembly required.  To engage the legs, simply pull them out and push them up.  They hold tight and sturdy.  Next, rotate the middle lock.  Then the top of the table comes off in four easy pieces.  All of the cool building block toys are inside!  Plenty of stickers are included to enhance creativity.  Not only do you get plenty of building blocks, you get a crane and a dump truck and a cool little smiley man!!  So, pull out the interior pieces from the storage space, set the road back up, and play!  There are handy little bins on the side of the table that double as both holders for pieces as you're building, and easy carrying devices once it's folded up.We've had hours of fun with this set!If you have a little one who's just getting into building blocks, I can't imagine them not loving this set.  It's easy to open and play with.  It has plenty of storage space and bright colorful pieces.  The entire set is made of sturdy plastic and the pieces interlock beautifully.  It's designed for the ease of parents and caregivers as well as children.

We love building blocks in our home!  You can build anything!  Everyone, from my special needs 9 year old to us crazy adults, have a blast seeing if we can outdo each other.This Mega Blocks tub is wonderful!  You get plenty of unusually shaped pieces to spur your imagination even further!  The box comes with stickers so that you can decorate your blocks to add to your creativity.  You also get plenty of 'regular' pieces to work with, and it lots of colors.The blocks are made of sturdy plastic and snap together easily and securely.  There isn't any issue with taking them apart and rebuilding.The only problem we had with this set is that there was no instruction booklet included.  We really wanted to build the boat that's shown on the box, but you can't really see it well enough to figure out the entire construction.  After several hours, we gave up and built something else.Over all, this is a great success for us! If you're adding to your current collection or just wanting to start one, this is a great place to start.

I tell you, my bathroom is always a wreck!  I'm a girly girl and I have hair thingies and hair stuff and makeup and all sorts of things in baskets all over the place.  It's my organizational style and it works!  (Until you add in large, bulky items!)I love this organizer!  You can hang it over the back of a door, or a spare towel bar, or even screw it straight into the wall if you don't want it movable.  It's made of sturdy chrome so you know it'll last awhile.  For me, the exciting part was that I now have a handy out-of-the-way space for my curling iron, straightener, and dryer!  There's even space in the basket for my dryer attachments!  Best of all, I don't have to wait for twenty minutes for my 'hair utensils' to cool off before putting them away!  Also, I never have to leave the house trying to remember if I unplugged them!Very handy and well thought out design!

This is such an overwhelmingly neat toy!  My son fell in love with Marble Racing games, and so we knew we had to have this one!It's complicated looking and colorful!  The instructions are mostly clear and they have colored illustrations to help. Also, several extra pieces were included just in case you need them for building.The pieces do snap together quite nicely for a snug fit.  This helps keep it sturdier after building so that it can be moved and played with, or then moved and stored for later use, without having to rebuild every time you want to play with it.  We did notice that the base pieces seem to shift more than the other pieces, but the spots for the towers are clearly marked, so you just snap them back in place.The best part of this toy is that it provides hours of entertainment with very little work.  You drop the marble in and watch it go crazy.  Then, when it reaches the bottom, it flies right back to the top and starts over!  It's like going down the slide repeatedly without having to keep climbing the ladder!There are some built in safety features that make this toy great, but I still wouldn't suggest a child put this together alone.  The enormity of the project and the bite of some of the pieces make it a bit more challenging.  It's an amazing parent/child project though and I'm so glad we did it!

I've used this grill several times in the past week.  It's just so convenient with our on-the-go family! It doesn't take up much counter space and the clean-up is a breeze.  I just use a damp sponge and it's ready to be used again.  I've used it for burgers, fish and vegetables so far.  The lid is hinged so it adjusts to the thickness of what I am cooking.  The juices drip into a tray that is easy to pop into the dishwasher.  I really like the fact that the meat is cooked on both sides at the same time, eliminating a lot of cooking time. The bun warmer is convenient and works very well.  When the burgers are done, the buns are toasty and warm.  No skillets to wash, no greasy stove top makes this a very convenient kitchen must have.  It may be our first George Foreman Grill, but it will definitely not be the last! I love it!

Wow! What a thrilling ride Lamaitre took me on with Alex! The very first pages grabbed my attention and didn't let go until the final pages were read.  It was not only suspenseful, but only emotionally impacting.  I empathized with Alex in the beginning, then I despised her and then I empathized with her again.  I was shocked with some of her decisions yet I also cheered for her.Camille, the investigator, was a great character as well.  Given a big case after being out of the loop since his wife was murdered was, at first, a conundrum for him.  But eventually, it became just what he needed to get closure in that chapter of his life.  A very intelligent man who surprised me on many levels.Alex is not only a thrilling suspense, it also packs a punch with it's gritty writing and no-nonsense characters.  The plot pivots many times, taking the reader on a roller-roaster of a ride that leaves one breathless; with fear, shock, hope and more.  I will be reading more of this author's work in the near future.

These wipes are very thick and sturdy - great for clean-up.  The scent is very light and refreshing.  I like the fact that it's not overwhelming and the fact that I don't need 3-10 wipes for one small job.  From small clean-ups to the big jobs, I love these wipes.  Great for the kitchen and bath, but we are using them in other living spaces as well as our vehicles for quick clean-ups.  Highly recommend!

This set is really neat.  It has nine different activities in it.  You get to build a Mercedes-Benze as an electric car or solar powered!  This kit comes with nearly everything you need to do all of the activities(you may want to make sure you have a couple of large paperclips around the house).  It also comes with a large, detailed instruction manual, complete with pictures.This it is  for children 8 years and older and with adult supervision. I was really excited to get this kit,  he had hours of fun with it!  He absolutely loved it! Though this might be a little difficult for a younger child alone,  it can be an entertaining and learning experience for those who are mechanically minded.

I am very impressed with this knife.  It's perfectly balanced and has a very sharp edge.  The knife isn't very heavy but it's not thin, but a solid piece of steel that has been honed perfectly.  I've been using it to slice meat and it's so smooth and easy - cut's like butter with excellent precision.  I will definitely be purchasing more of these knives.  The soft, comfortable grip is a great bonus.

We have scissors all over the house for a variety of projects that we all seem to be working on.  These scissors paled in comparison to some others.  They are very lightweight and easy to hold.  My hand didn't cramp from using them for an extended period of time.  However, they are really flimsy.  I was afraid they would break if used too frequently and on anything besides paper.  On paper products, they were very precise and cut well.  On fabric, it had to be a thin cotton.  They labored with a tweed.  If you're looking for a good scissor for school or just for paper wrapping or products, then this scissor would work nicely.  Anything heavier, I would pass.

I love this company.  They're proud sponsors of the Folk Artist's Foundation.  On each box of baking mix they feature a folk artist and their work.  Not only that, in 2003, they set the Guinness record for baking the world's largest cookie!  It measured 102 feet in diameter!As for their baking mix, I have to admit that unless I'm making homemade, this will be my brownie of choice from now on.  Previously, I was a Ghirardelli fan.  This brownie batter is easy to mix together and has a nice, thick consistency.  After baking, they come out chewy and moist and delicious with that wonderful hint of crispy on the top.  What I enjoyed most about these brownies is that they really do taste homemade.  They have  a strong chocolate taste, but they're not too sweet.

I was surprised of the quality of this rug when I received it.  I'm so used to the cheaper rag rugs having loose seams, gaps between weaves and just put together very shoddy. This rug, though, was thick with no loose threads.  The color is rich and although it's a small rug, it's perfect for small entry ways or in a kitchen or bath.
